
sonnets



fairest creatures desire increase
thereby beauty rose might never die
riper time decease
tender heir might bear memory
thou contracted thine bright eyes
feed st thy light flame self substantial fuel
making famine abundance lies
thy self thy foe thy sweet self cruel
thou art world fresh ornament
herald gaudy spring
within thine bud buriest thy content
tender churl mak st waste niggarding
pity world else glutton
eat world due grave thee




forty winters shall besiege thy brow
dig deep trenches thy beauty field
thy youth proud livery gazed
tattered weed small worth held
asked thy beauty lies
treasure thy lusty days
say within thine deep sunken eyes
eating shame thriftless praise
much praise deserv thy beauty use
thou couldst answer fair child mine
shall sum count make old excuse
proving beauty succession thine
new made thou art old
see thy blood warm thou feel st cold




look thy glass tell face thou viewest
time face form another
whose fresh repair thou renewest
thou dost beguile world unbless mother
fair whose uneared womb
disdains tillage thy husbandry
fond tomb
self love stop posterity
thou art thy mother glass thee
calls back lovely april prime
thou windows thine age shalt see
despite wrinkles thy golden time
thou live remembered
die single thine image dies thee




unthrifty loveliness dost thou spend
upon thy self thy beauty legacy
nature bequest gives nothing doth lend
frank lends free
beauteous niggard dost thou abuse
bounteous largess given thee give
profitless usurer dost thou use
great sum sums yet canst live
traffic thy self alone
thou thy self thy sweet self dost deceive
nature calls thee gone
acceptable audit canst thou leave
thy unused beauty must tombed thee
used lives th executor




hours gentle work frame
lovely gaze every eye doth dwell
play tyrants
unfair fairly doth excel
never resting time leads summer
hideous winter confounds
sap checked frost lusty leaves quite gone
beauty er snowed bareness every
summer distillation left
liquid prisoner pent walls glass
beauty effect beauty bereft
remembrance
flowers distilled though winter meet
leese show substance still lives sweet




let winter ragged hand deface
thee thy summer ere thou distilled
make sweet vial treasure thou place
beauty treasure ere self killed
use forbidden usury
happies pay willing loan
thy self breed another thee
ten times happier ten one
ten times thy self happier thou art
ten thine ten times refigured thee
could death thou shouldst depart
leaving thee living posterity
self willed thou art much fair
death conquest make worms thine heir




lo orient gracious light
lifts burning head eye
doth homage new appearing sight
serving looks sacred majesty
climbed steep heavenly hill
resembling strong youth middle age
yet mortal looks adore beauty still
attending golden pilgrimage
highmost pitch weary car
like feeble age reeleth day
eyes fore duteous converted
low tract look another way
thou thy self going thy noon
unlooked diest unless thou get son




music hear hear st thou music sadly
sweets sweets war joy delights joy
lov st thou thou receiv st gladly
else receiv st pleasure thine annoy
true concord well tuned sounds
unions married offend thine ear
sweetly chide thee confounds
singleness parts thou shouldst bear
mark one string sweet husband another
strikes mutual ordering
resembling sire child happy mother
one one pleasing note sing
whose speechless song many seeming one
sings thee thou single wilt prove none




fear wet widow eye
thou consum st thy self single life
ah thou issueless shalt hap die
world wail thee like makeless wife
world thy widow still weep
thou form thee hast left behind
every private widow well may keep
children eyes husband shape mind
look unthrift world doth spend
shifts place still world enjoys
beauty waste hath world end
kept unused user destroys
love toward others bosom sits
murd rous shame commits




shame deny thou bear st love
thy self art unprovident
grant thou wilt thou art beloved many
thou none lov st evident
thou art possessed murd rous hate
gainst thy self thou stick st conspire
seeking beauteous roof ruinate
repair thy chief desire
change thy thought may change mind
shall hate fairer lodged gentle love
thy presence gracious kind
thy self least kind hearted prove
make thee another self love
beauty still may live thine thee




fast thou shalt wane fast thou grow st
one thine thou departest
fresh blood youngly thou bestow st
thou mayst call thine thou youth convertest
herein lives wisdom beauty increase
without folly age cold decay
minded times cease
threescore year would make world away
let nature hath made store
harsh featureless rude barrenly perish
look best endowed gave thee
bounteous gift thou shouldst bounty cherish
carved thee seal meant thereby
thou shouldst print let copy die




count clock tells time
see brave day sunk hideous night
behold violet past prime
sable curls silvered er white
lofty trees see barren leaves
erst heat canopy herd
summer green girded sheaves
borne bier white bristly beard
thy beauty question make
thou among wastes time must go
since sweets beauties forsake
die fast see others grow
nothing gainst time scythe make defence
save breed brave takes thee hence




self love
longer self live
coming end prepare
sweet semblance give
beauty hold lease
find determination
self self decease
sweet issue sweet form bear
lets fair house fall decay
husbandry honour might uphold
stormy gusts winter day
barren rage death eternal cold
none unthrifts dear love know
father let son say




stars judgement pluck
yet methinks astronomy
tell good evil luck
plagues dearths seasons quality
fortune brief minutes tell
pointing thunder rain wind
say princes shall go well
oft predict heaven find
thine eyes knowledge derive
constant stars read art
truth beauty shall together thrive
thy self store thou wouldst convert
else thee prognosticate
thy end truth beauty doom date




consider every thing grows
holds perfection little moment
huge stage presenteth nought shows
whereon stars secret influence comment
perceive men plants increase
cheered checked even self sky
vaunt youthful sap height decrease
wear brave state memory
conceit inconstant stay
sets rich youth sight
wasteful time debateth decay
change day youth sullied night
war time love
takes engraft new




wherefore mightier way
make war upon bloody tyrant time
fortify self decay
means blessed barren rhyme
stand top happy hours
many maiden gardens yet unset
virtuous wish would bear living flowers
much liker painted counterfeit
lines life life repair
time pencil pupil pen
neither inward worth outward fair
make live self eyes men
give away self keeps self still
must live drawn sweet skill




believe verse time come
filled high deserts
though yet heaven knows tomb
hides life shows half parts
could write beauty eyes
fresh numbers number graces
age come would say poet lies
heavenly touches ne er touched earthly faces
papers yellowed age
scorned like old men less truth tongue
true rights termed poet rage
stretched metre antique song
child alive time
live twice rhyme




shall compare thee summer day
thou art lovely temperate
rough winds shake darling buds may
summer lease hath short date
sometime hot eye heaven shines
often gold complexion dimmed
every fair fair sometime declines
chance nature changing course untrimmed
thy eternal summer shall fade
lose possession fair thou ow st
shall death brag thou wand rest shade
eternal lines time thou grow st
long men breathe eyes see
long lives gives life thee




devouring time blunt thou lion paws
make earth devour sweet brood
pluck keen teeth fierce tiger jaws
burn long lived phoenix blood
make glad sorry seasons thou fleet st
whate er thou wilt swift footed time
wide world fading sweets
forbid thee one heinous crime
carve thy hours love fair brow
draw lines thine antique pen
thy course untainted allow
beauty pattern succeeding men
yet thy worst old time despite thy wrong
love shall verse ever live young




woman face nature hand painted
hast thou master mistress passion
woman gentle heart acquainted
shifting change false women fashion
eye bright less false rolling
gilding object whereupon gazeth
man hue hues controlling
steals men eyes women souls amazeth
woman wert thou first created
till nature wrought thee fell doting
addition thee defeated
adding one thing purpose nothing
since pricked thee women pleasure
mine thy love thy love use treasure




muse
stirred painted beauty verse
heaven self ornament doth use
every fair fair doth rehearse
making couplement proud compare
sun moon earth sea rich gems
april first born flowers things rare
heaven air huge rondure hems
let true love truly write
believe love fair
mother child though bright
gold candles fixed heaven air
let say like hearsay well
praise purpose sell




glass shall persuade old
long youth thou one date
thee time furrows behold
look death days expiate
beauty doth cover thee
seemly raiment heart
thy breast doth live thine
elder thou art
therefore love thyself wary
self thee
bearing thy heart keep chary
tender nurse babe faring ill
presume thy heart mine slain
thou gav st thine give back




unperfect actor stage
fear put beside part
fierce thing replete much rage
whose strength abundance weakens heart
fear trust forget say
perfect ceremony love rite
mine love strength seem decay
ercharged burthen mine love might
let looks eloquence
dumb presagers speaking breast
plead love look recompense
tongue hath expressed
learn read silent love hath writ
hear eyes belongs love fine wit




mine eye hath played painter hath stelled
thy beauty form table heart
body frame wherein tis held
perspective best painter art
painter must see skill
find true image pictured lies
bosom shop hanging still
hath windows glazed thine eyes
see good turns eyes eyes done
mine eyes drawn thy shape thine
windows breast sun
delights peep gaze therein thee
yet eyes cunning want grace art
draw see know heart




let favour stars
public honour proud titles boast
whilst fortune triumph bars
unlooked joy honour
great princes favourites fair leaves spread
marigold sun eye
pride lies buried
frown glory die
painful warrior famoused fight
thousand victories foiled
book honour razed quite
rest forgot toiled
happy love beloved
may remove removed




lord love vassalage
thy merit hath duty strongly knit
thee send written embassage
witness duty show wit
duty great wit poor mine
may make seem bare wanting words show
hope good conceit thine
thy soul thought naked bestow
till whatsoever star guides moving
points graciously fair aspect
puts apparel tattered loving
show worthy thy sweet respect
may dare boast love thee
till show head thou mayst prove




weary toil haste bed
dear respose limbs travel tired
begins journey head
work mind body work expired
thoughts far abide
intend zealous pilgrimage thee
keep drooping eyelids open wide
looking darkness blind see
save soul imaginary sight
presents thy shadow sightless view
like jewel hung ghastly night
makes black night beauteous old face new
lo thus day limbs night mind
thee self quiet find




return happy plight
debarred benefit rest
day oppression eased night
day night night day oppressed
though enemies either reign
consent shake hands torture
one toil complain
far toil still farther thee
tell day please thou art bright
dost grace clouds blot heaven
flatter swart complexioned night
sparkling stars twire thou gild st even
day doth daily draw sorrows longer
night doth nightly make grief length seem stronger




disgrace fortune men eyes
alone beweep outcast state
trouble deaf heaven bootless cries
look upon self curse fate
wishing like one rich hope
featured like like friends possessed
desiring man art man scope
enjoy contented least
yet thoughts self almost despising
haply think thee state
like lark break day arising
sullen earth sings hymns heaven gate
thy sweet love remembered wealth brings
scorn change state kings




sessions sweet silent thought
summon remembrance things past
sigh lack many thing sought
old woes new wail dear time waste
drown eye unused flow
precious friends hid death dateless night
weep afresh love long since cancelled woe
moan th expense many vanished sight
grieve grievances foregone
heavily woe woe tell er
sad account fore bemoaned moan
new pay paid
think thee dear friend
losses restored sorrows end




thy bosom endeared hearts
lacking supposed dead
reigns love love loving parts
friends thought buried
many holy obsequious tear
hath dear religious love stol n mine eye
interest dead appear
things removed hidden thee lie
thou art grave buried love doth live
hung trophies lovers gone
parts thee give
due many thine alone
images loved view thee
thou hast




thou survive well contented day
churl death bones dust shall cover
shalt fortune survey
poor rude lines thy deceased lover
compare bett ring time
though outstripped every pen
reserve love rhyme
exceeded height happier men
vouchsafe loving thought
friend muse grown growing age
dearer birth love brought
march ranks better equipage
since died poets better prove
style read love




full many glorious morning seen
flatter mountain tops sovereign eye
kissing golden face meadows green
gilding pale streams heavenly alchemy
anon permit basest clouds ride
ugly rack celestial face
forlorn world visage hide
stealing unseen west disgrace
even sun one early morn shine
triumphant splendour brow
alack one hour mine
region cloud hath masked
yet love whit disdaineth
suns world may stain heaven sun staineth




didst thou promise beauteous day
make travel forth without cloak
let base clouds ertake way
hiding thy brav ry rotten smoke
tis enough cloud thou break
dry rain storm beaten face
man well salve speak
heals wound cures disgrace
thy shame give physic grief
though thou repent yet still loss
th offender sorrow lends weak relief
bears strong offence cross
ah tears pearl thy love sheds
rich ransom ill deeds




grieved thou hast done
roses thorns silver fountains mud
clouds eclipses stain moon sun
loathsome canker lives sweetest bud
men make faults even
authorizing thy trespass compare
self corrupting salving thy amiss
excusing thy sins thy sins
thy sensual fault bring sense
thy adverse party thy advocate
gainst self lawful plea commence
civil war love hate
accessary needs must
sweet thief sourly robs




let confess two must twain
although undivided loves one
shall blots remain
without thy help borne alone
two loves one respect
though lives separable spite
though alter love sole effect
yet doth steal sweet hours love delight
may evermore acknowledge thee
lest bewailed guilt thee shame
thou public kindness honour
unless thou take honour thy name
love thee sort
thou mine mine thy good report




decrepit father takes delight
see active child deeds youth
made lame fortune dearest spite
take comfort thy worth truth
whether beauty birth wealth wit

entitled thy parts crowned sit
make love engrafted store
lame poor despised
whilst shadow doth substance give
thy abundance sufficed
part thy glory live
look best best wish thee
wish ten times happy




muse want subject invent
thou dost breathe pour st verse
thine sweet argument excellent
every vulgar paper rehearse
give thy self thanks aught
worthy perusal stand thy sight
dumb write thee
thou thy self dost give invention light
thou tenth muse ten times worth
old nine rhymers invocate
calls thee let bring forth
eternal numbers outlive long date
slight muse please curious days
pain mine thine shall praise




thy worth manners may sing
thou art better part
mine praise mine self bring
mine praise thee
even let us divided live
dear love lose name single one
separation may give
due thee thou deserv st alone
absence torment wouldst thou prove
thy sour leisure gave sweet leave
entertain time thoughts love
time thoughts sweetly doth deceive
thou teachest make one twain
praising doth hence remain




take loves love yea take
hast thou thou hadst
love love thou mayst true love call
mine thine thou hadst
love thou love receivest
blame thee love thou usest
yet blamed thou thy self deceivest
wilful taste thy self refusest
forgive thy robbery gentle thief
although thou steal thee poverty
yet love knows greater grief
bear greater wrong hate known injury
lascivious grace ill well shows
kill spites yet must foes




pretty wrongs liberty commits
sometime absent thy heart
thy beauty thy years full well befits
still temptation follows thou art
gentle thou art therefore
beauteous thou art therefore assailed
woman woos woman son
sourly leave till prevailed
ay yet thou mightst seat forbear
chide thy beauty thy straying youth
lead thee riot even
thou art forced break twofold truth
thy beauty tempting thee
thine thy beauty false




thou hast grief
yet may said loved dearly
hath thee wailing chief
loss love touches nearly
loving offenders thus excuse ye
thou dost love thou know st love
sake even doth abuse
suff ring friend sake approve
lose thee loss love gain
losing friend hath found loss
find lose twain
sake lay cross
joy friend one
sweet flattery loves alone




wink mine eyes best see
day view things unrespected
sleep dreams look thee
darkly bright bright dark directed
thou whose shadow shadows doth make bright
would thy shadow form form happy show
clear day thy much clearer light
unseeing eyes thy shade shines
would say mine eyes blessed made
looking thee living day
dead night thy fair imperfect shade
heavy sleep sightless eyes doth stay
days nights see till see thee
nights bright days dreams show thee




dull substance flesh thought
injurious distance stop way
despite space would brought
limits far remote thou dost stay
matter although foot stand
upon farthest earth removed thee
nimble thought jump sea land
soon think place would
ah thought kills thought
leap large lengths miles thou art gone
much earth water wrought
must attend time leisure moan
receiving nought elements slow
heavy tears badges either woe




two slight air purging fire
thee wherever abide
first thought desire
present absent swift motion slide
quicker elements gone
tender embassy love thee
life made four two alone
sinks death oppressed melancholy
life composition recured
swift messengers returned thee
even come back assured
thy fair health recounting
told joy longer glad
send back straight grow sad




mine eye heart mortal war
divide conquest thy sight
mine eye heart thy picture sight would bar
heart mine eye freedom right
heart doth plead thou dost lie
closet never pierced crystal eyes
defendant doth plea deny
says thy fair appearance lies
side title impanelled
quest thoughts tenants heart
verdict determined
clear eye moiety dear heart part
thus mine eye due thy outward part
heart right thy inward love heart




betwixt mine eye heart league took
doth good turns unto
mine eye famished look
heart love sighs doth smother
love picture eye doth feast
painted banquet bids heart
another time mine eye heart guest
thoughts love doth share part
either thy picture love
thy self away art present still
thou farther thoughts canst move
still thee
sleep thy picture sight
awakes heart heart eye delight




careful took way
trifle truest bars thrust
use might unused stay
hands falsehood sure wards trust
thou jewels trifles
worthy comfort greatest grief
thou best dearest mine care
art left prey every vulgar thief
thee locked chest
save thou art though feel thou art
within gentle closure breast
whence pleasure thou mayst come part
even thence thou wilt stol n fear
truth proves thievish prize dear




time ever time come
shall see thee frown defects
thy love hath cast utmost sum
called audit advised respects
time thou shalt strangely pass
scarcely greet sun thine eye
love converted thing
shall reasons find settled gravity
time ensconce
within knowledge mine desert
hand self uprear
guard lawful reasons thy part
leave poor thou hast strength laws
since love allege cause




heavy journey way
seek weary travel end
doth teach case repose say
thus far miles measured thy friend
beast bears tired woe
plods dully bear weight
instinct wretch know
rider loved speed made thee
bloody spur provoke
sometimes anger thrusts hide
heavily answers groan
sharp spurring side
groan doth put mind
grief lies onward joy behind




thus love excuse slow offence
dull bearer thee speed
thou art haste thence
till return posting need
excuse poor beast find
swift extremity seem slow
spur though mounted wind
winged speed motion shall know
horse desire keep pace
therefore desire perfect st love made
shall neigh dull flesh fiery race
love love thus shall excuse jade
since thee going went wilful slow
towards thee run give leave go




rich whose blessed key
bring sweet locked treasure
every hour survey
blunting fine point seldom pleasure
therefore feasts solemn rare
since seldom coming long year set
like stones worth thinly placed
captain jewels carcanet
time keeps chest
wardrobe robe doth hide
make special instant special blest
new unfolding imprisoned pride
blessed whose worthiness gives scope
triumph lacked hope




substance whereof made
millions strange shadows tend
since every one hath every one one shade
one every shadow lend
describe adonis counterfeit
poorly imitated
helen cheek art beauty set
grecian tires painted new
speak spring foison year
one doth shadow beauty show
bounty doth appear
every blessed shape know
external grace part
like none none constant heart




much doth beauty beauteous seem
sweet ornament truth doth give
rose looks fair fairer deem
sweet odour doth live
canker blooms full deep dye
perfumed tincture roses
hang thorns play wantonly
summer breath masked buds discloses
virtue show
live unwooed unrespected fade
die sweet roses
sweet deaths sweetest odours made
beauteous lovely youth
shall fade verse distills truth




marble gilded monuments
princes shall outlive powerful rhyme
shall shine bright contents
unswept stone besmeared sluttish time
wasteful war shall statues overturn
broils root work masonry
mars sword war quick fire shall burn
living record memory
gainst death oblivious enmity
shall pace forth praise shall still find room
even eyes posterity
wear world ending doom
till judgment self arise
live dwell lovers eyes




sweet love renew thy force said
thy edge blunter appetite
day feeding allayed
morrow sharpened former might
love thou although day thou fill
thy hungry eyes even till wink fulness
morrow see kill
spirit love perpetual dulness
let sad interim like ocean
parts shore two contracted new
come daily banks see
return love blest may view
call winter full care
makes summer welcome thrice wished rare




slave tend
upon hours times desire
precious time spend
services till require
dare chide world without end hour
whilst sovereign watch clock
think bitterness absence sour
bid servant adieu
dare question jealous thought
may affairs suppose
like sad slave stay think nought
save happy make
true fool love
though thing thinks ill




god forbid made first slave
thought control times pleasure
hand th account hours crave
vassal bound stay leisure
let suffer beck
th imprisoned absence liberty
patience tame sufferance bide check
without accusing injury
list charter strong
self may privilage time
doth belong
self pardon self crime
wait though waiting hell
blame pleasure ill well




nothing new
hath brains beguiled
labouring invention bear amis
second burthen former child
record could backward look
even five hundred courses sun
show image antique book
since mind first character done
might see old world could say
composed wonder frame
whether mended whether better
whether revolution
sure wits former days
subjects worse given admiring praise




like waves make towards pebbled shore
minutes hasten end
changing place goes
sequent toil forwards contend
nativity main light
crawls maturity wherewith crowned
crooked eclipses gainst glory fight
time gave doth gift confound
time doth transfix flourish set youth
delves parallels beauty brow
feeds rarities nature truth
nothing stands scythe mow
yet times hope verse shall stand
praising thy worth despite cruel hand




thy thy image keep open
heavy eyelids weary night
dost thou desire slumbers broken
shadows like thee mock sight
thy spirit thou send st thee
far home deeds pry
find shames idle hours
scope tenure thy jealousy
thy love though much great
love keeps mine eye awake
mine true love doth rest defeat
play watchman ever thy sake
thee watch whilst thou dost wake elsewhere
far others near




sin self love possesseth mine eye
soul every part
sin remedy
grounded inward heart
methinks face gracious mine
shape true truth account
self mine worth define
worths surmount
glass shows self indeed
beated chopt tanned antiquity
mine self love quite contrary read
self self loving iniquity
tis thee self self praise
painting age beauty thy days




love shall
time injurious hand crushed erworn
hours drained blood filled brow
lines wrinkles youthful morn
hath travelled age steepy night
beauties whereof king
vanishing vanished sight
stealing away treasure spring
time fortify
confounding age cruel knife
shall never cut memory
sweet love beauty though lover life
beauty shall black lines seen
shall live still green




seen time fell hand defaced
rich proud cost outworn buried age
sometime lofty towers see rased
brass eternal slave mortal rage
seen hungry ocean gain
advantage kingdom shore
firm soil win watery main
increasing store loss loss store
seen interchange state
state self confounded decay
ruin hath taught thus ruminate
time come take love away
thought death choose
weep fears lose




since brass stone earth boundless sea
sad mortality ersways power
rage shall beauty hold plea
whose action stronger flower
shall summer honey breath hold
wrackful siege batt ring days
rocks impregnable stout
gates steel strong time decays
fearful meditation alack
shall time best jewel time chest lie hid
strong hand hold swift foot back
spoil beauty forbid
none unless miracle might
black ink love may still shine bright




tired restful death cry
behold desert beggar born
needy nothing trimmed jollity
purest faith unhappily forsworn
gilded honour shamefully misplaced
maiden virtue rudely strumpeted
right perfection wrongfully disgraced
strength limping sway disabled
art made tongue tied authority
folly doctor like controlling skill
simple truth miscalled simplicity
captive good attending captain ill
tired would gone
save die leave love alone




ah wherefore infection live
presence grace impiety
sin advantage achieve
lace self society
false painting imitate cheek
steal dead seeming living hue
poor beauty indirectly seek
roses shadow since rose true
live nature bankrupt
beggared blood blush lively veins
hath exchequer
proud many lives upon gains
stores show wealth
days long since last bad




thus cheek map days outworn
beauty lived died flowers
bastard signs fair born
durst inhabit living brow
golden tresses dead
right sepulchres shorn away
live second life second head
ere beauty dead fleece made another gay
holy antique hours seen
without ornament self true
making summer another green
robbing old dress beauty new
map doth nature store
show false art beauty yore




parts thee world eye doth view
want nothing thought hearts mend
tongues voice souls give thee due
uttering bare truth even foes commend
thy outward thus outward praise crowned
tongues give thee thine
accents praise confound
seeing farther eye hath shown
look beauty thy mind
guess measure thy deeds
churls thoughts although eyes kind
thy fair flower add rank smell weeds
thy odour matcheth thy show
soil thou dost common grow




thou art blamed shall thy defect
slander mark ever yet fair
ornament beauty suspect
crow flies heaven sweetest air
thou good slander doth approve
thy worth greater wooed time
canker vice sweetest buds doth love
thou present st pure unstained prime
thou hast passed ambush young days
either assailed victor charged
yet thy praise thy praise
tie envy evermore enlarged
suspect ill masked thy show
thou alone kingdoms hearts shouldst owe




longer mourn dead
shall hear surly sullen bell
give warning world fled
vile world vilest worms dwell
nay read line remember
hand writ love
sweet thoughts would forgot
thinking make woe
say look upon verse
perhaps compounded clay
much poor name rehearse
let love even life decay
lest wise world look moan
mock gone




lest world task recite
merit lived love
death dear love forget quite
nothing worthy prove
unless would devise virtuous lie
mine desert
hang praise upon deceased
niggard truth would willingly impart
lest true love may seem false
love speak well untrue
name buried body
live shame
shamed bring forth
love things nothing worth




time year thou mayst behold
yellow leaves none hang
upon boughs shake cold
bare ruined choirs late sweet birds sang
thou seest twilight day
sunset fadeth west
black night doth take away
death second self seals rest
thou seest glowing fire
ashes youth doth lie
death bed whereon must expire
consumed nourished
thou perceiv st makes thy love strong
love well thou must leave ere long




contented fell arrest
without bail shall carry away
life hath line interest
memorial still thee shall stay
thou reviewest thou dost review
part consecrate thee
earth earth due
spirit thine better part
thou hast lost dregs life
prey worms body dead
coward conquest wretch knife
base thee remembered
worth contains
thee remains




thoughts food life
sweet seasoned showers ground
peace hold strife
twixt miser wealth found
proud enjoyer anon
doubting filching age steal treasure
counting best alone
bettered world may see pleasure
sometime full feasting sight
clean starved look
possessing pursuing delight
save must took
thus pine surfeit day day
gluttoning away




verse barren new pride
far variation quick change
time glance aside
new found methods compounds strange
write still one ever
keep invention noted weed
every word doth almost tell name
showing birth proceed
know sweet love always write
love still argument
best dressing old words new
spending already spent
sun daily new old
love still telling told




thy glass show thee thy beauties wear
thy dial thy precious minutes waste
vacant leaves thy mind imprint bear
book learning mayst thou taste
wrinkles thy glass truly show
mouthed graves give thee memory
thou thy dial shady stealth mayst know
time thievish progress eternity
look thy memory contain
commit waste blanks thou shalt find
children nursed delivered thy brain
take new acquaintance thy mind
offices oft thou wilt look
shall profit thee much enrich thy book




oft invoked thee muse
found fair assistance verse
every alien pen hath got use
thee poesy disperse
thine eyes taught dumb high sing
heavy ignorance aloft fly
added feathers learned wing
given grace double majesty
yet proud compile
whose influence thine born thee
others works thou dost mend style
arts thy sweet graces graced
thou art art dost advance
high learning rude ignorance




whilst alone call upon thy aid
verse alone thy gentle grace
gracious numbers decayed
sick muse doth give place
grant sweet love thy lovely argument
deserves travail worthier pen
yet thee thy poet doth invent
robs thee pays thee
lends thee virtue stole word
thy behaviour beauty doth give
found thy cheek afford
praise thee thee doth live
thank doth say
since owes thee thou thy self dost pay




faint write
knowing better spirit doth use name
praise thereof spends might
make tongue tied speaking fame
since worth wide ocean
humble proudest sail doth bear
saucy bark inferior far
broad main doth wilfully appear
shallowest help hold afloat
whilst upon soundless deep doth ride
wrecked worthless boat
tall building goodly pride
thrive cast away
worst love decay




shall live epitaph make
survive earth rotten
hence memory death take
although part forgotten
name hence immortal life shall
though gone world must die
earth yield common grave
entombed men eyes shall lie
monument shall gentle verse
eyes yet created shall er read
tongues shall rehearse
breathers world dead
still shall live virtue hath pen
breath breathes even mouths men




grant thou wert married muse
therefore mayst without attaint erlook
dedicated words writers use
fair subject blessing every book
thou art fair knowledge hue
finding thy worth limit past praise
therefore art enforced seek anew
fresher stamp time bettering days
love yet devised
strained touches rhetoric lend
thou truly fair wert truly sympathized
true plain words thy true telling friend
gross painting might better used
cheeks need blood thee abused

therefore fair painting set

therefore slept report

far modern quill doth come short

silence sin impute
shall glory dumb
impair beauty mute
others would give life bring tomb
lives life one fair eyes
poets praise devise

rich praise alone

making style admired every
beauteous blessings add curse
fond praise makes praises worse

shall live supposing thou art true
like deceived husband love face
may still seem love though altered new

like eve apple doth thy beauty grow
thy sweet virtue answer thy show

poor soul centre sinful earth

fair whereon false eyes dote

canst thou cruel say love thee
self thee partake
think thee forgot
self tyrant thy sake
hateth thee call friend

nay thou lour st spend

power hast thou powerful might
insufficiency heart sway
make give lie true sight
swear brightness doth grace day
whence hast thou becoming things ill
refuse thy deeds
strength warrantise skill
mind thy worst best exceeds
taught thee make love thee
hear see cause hate
though love others abhor
others thou shouldst abhor state
thy unworthiness raised love
worthy beloved thee




love young know conscience
yet knows conscience born love
gentle cheater urge amiss
lest guilty faults thy sweet self prove
thou betraying betray
nobler part gross body treason
soul doth tell body may
triumph love flesh stays farther reason
rising thy name doth point thee
triumphant prize proud pride
contented thy poor drudge
stand thy affairs fall thy side
want conscience hold call
love whose dear love rise fall




loving thee thou know st forsworn
thou art twice forsworn love swearing
act thy bed vow broke new faith torn
vowing new hate new love bearing
two oaths breach accuse thee
break twenty perjured
vows oaths misuse thee
honest faith thee lost
sworn deep oaths thy deep kindness
oaths thy love thy truth thy constancy
enlighten thee gave eyes blindness
made swear thing see
sworn thee fair perjured
swear truth foul




cupid laid brand fell asleep
maid dian advantage found
love kindling fire quickly steep
cold valley fountain ground
borrowed holy fire love
dateless lively heat still endure
grew seeting bath yet men prove
strange maladies sovereign cure
mistress eye love brand new fired
boy trial needs would touch breast
sick withal help bath desired
thither hied sad distempered guest
found cure bath help lies
cupid got new fire mistress eyes




little love god lying asleep
laid side heart inflaming brand
whilst many nymphs vowed chaste life keep
came tripping maiden hand
fairest votary took fire
many legions true hearts warmed
general hot desire
sleeping virgin hand disarmed
brand quenched cool well
love fire took heat perpetual
growing bath healthful remedy
men discased mistress thrall
came cure prove
love fire heats water water cools love


end

act iv

scene without florentine camp

enter first lord five six soldiers ambush

first lord
come way hedge corner sally upon
speak terrible language though understand
matter must seem understand
unless someone among us must produce interpreter

first soldier
good captain let th interpreter

first lord
art acquainted knows thy voice

first soldier
sir warrant

first lord
linsey woolsey thou speak us

first soldier
e en speak

first lord
must think us band strangers adversary
entertainment hath smack neighbouring languages
therefore must every one man fancy know
speak one another seem know know straight
purpose choughs language gabble enough good enough
interpreter must seem politic couch ho comes
beguile two hours sleep return swear lies
forges

enter parolles

parolles
ten clock within three hours twill time enough go home
shall say done must plausive invention
carries begin smoke disgraces late knock
often door find tongue foolhardy heart
hath fear mars creatures daring
reports tongue

first lord
aside first truth e er thine tongue
guilty

parolles
devil move undertake recovery drum
ignorant impossibility knowing
purpose must give hurts say got exploit
yet slight ones carry say came
little great ones dare give wherefore
instance tongue must put butter woman mouth buy
another bajazet mule prattle perils

aside possible know

breaking spanish sword

aside afford

octavia wife whose beauty claims
worse husband best men
whose virtue whose general graces speak
none else utter marriage
little jealousies seem great
great fears import dangers
would nothing truths would tales

duty ruminated

act iii


scene plain syria

enter ventidius triumph silius romans
officers soldiers dead body pacorus borne

ventidius
darting parthia art thou struck
pleased fortune marcus crassus death
make revenger bear king son body
army thy pacorus orodes
pays marcus crassus

silius
noble ventidius
whilst yet parthian blood thy sword warm
fugitive parthians follow spur media
mesopotamia shelters whither
routed fly thy grand captain antony
shall set thee triumphant chariots
put garlands thy head

ventidius
silius silius
done enough lower place note well
may make great act learn silius
better leave undone deed
acquire high fame serve away
caesar antony ever
officer person sossius
one place syria lieutenant
quick accumulation renown
achieved th minute lost favour
th wars captain
becomes captain captain ambition
soldier virtue rather makes choice loss
gain darkens
could antonius good
twould offend offence
performance perish

silius
thou hast ventidius
without soldier sword
grants scarce distinction thou wilt write antony

ventidius
humbly signify name
magical word war effected
banners well paid ranks
ne er yet beaten horse parthia
jaded th field

silius


ventidius
purposeth athens whither haste
weight must convey permit
shall appear pass along

exeunt

scene iv athens room antony house

enter antony octavia

antony

excusable thousands

new wars gainst pompey made read
public ear

best hint given took
teeth

good lord
believe must believe
stomach unhappy lady

good gods mock presently

bless brother husband win win brother
prays destroys prayer midway
twixt extremes

lose better

raise preparation war

desires

solder rift

never equal love
equally move provide going

heart mind

scene vi rome room caesar house

act scene orchard oliver house

enter orlando adam

orlando remember adam upon fashion bequeathed
poor thousand crowns thou say st charged
brother blessing breed well begins
sadness brother jaques keeps school report speaks
goldenly profit part keeps rustically home
speak properly stays home unkept call
keeping gentleman birth differs
stalling ox horses bred better besides
fair feeding taught manage
end riders dearly hir brother gain nothing
growth animals dunghills
much bound besides nothing
plentifully gives something nature gave
countenance seems take lets feed hinds
bars place brother much lies mines
gentility education adam grieves
spirit father think within begins mutiny
servitude longer endure though yet know
wise remedy avoid

enter oliver

adam yonder comes master brother
orlando go apart adam thou shalt hear shake
adam retires
oliver sir make
orlando nothing taught make thing
oliver mar sir
orlando marry sir helping mar god made
poor unworthy brother idleness
oliver marry sir better employed nought awhile
orlando shall keep hogs eat husks
prodigal portion spent come penury

orlando sir well orchard
oliver know sir
orlando ay better knows know
eldest brother gentle condition blood
know courtesy nations allows better
first born tradition takes
away blood twenty brothers betwixt us
much father albeit confess coming

duke
merchant syracusa plead
partial infringe laws
enmity discord late

wanting guilders redeem lives
seal rigorous statutes bloods
excludes pity threat ning looks
since mortal intestine jars
twixt thy seditious countrymen us
hath solemn synods decreed
syracusians
admit traffic adverse towns
nay born ephesus
seen syracusian marts fairs
syracusian born
come bay ephesus dies
goods confiscate duke dispose

therefore law thou art condemn die

woes end likewise evening sun

heavier task could impos
speak griefs unspeakable
yet world may witness end
wrought nature vile offence
utter sorrow gives leave
syracusa born wed
unto woman happy
hap bad
liv joy wealth increas
prosperous voyages often made
epidamnum till factor death
great care goods random left
drew kind embracements spouse
absence six months old
almost fainting
pleasing punishment women bear
made provision following
soon safe arrived
long became
joyful mother two goodly sons
strange one like
could distinguish names
hour self inn
mean woman delivered
burden male twins alike
parents exceeding poor
bought brought attend sons
wife meanly proud two boys
made daily motions home return
unwilling agreed alas soon
came aboard
league epidamnum sail
always wind obeying deep
gave tragic instance harm
longer retain much hope
obscured light heavens grant
convey unto fearful minds
doubtful warrant immediate death
though would gladly embrac
yet incessant weepings wife
weeping saw must come
piteous plainings pretty babes
mourn fashion ignorant fear
forc seek delays
means none
sailors sought safety boat
left ship sinking ripe us
wife careful latter born
fast ned unto small spare mast
sea faring men provide storms
one twins bound
whilst like heedful
children thus dispos wife
fixing eyes care fix
fast ned either end mast
floating straight obedient stream
carried towards corinth thought
length sun gazing upon earth
dispers vapours offended us
benefit wished light
seas wax calm discovered
two ships far making amain us
corinth epidaurus
ere came let say
gather sequel went

duke
nay forward old man break
may pity though pardon thee

egeon
gods done
worthily term merciless us
ere ships could meet twice five leagues
encountered mighty rock
violently borne upon
helpful ship splitted midst
unjust divorce us
fortune left us alike
delight sorrow
part poor soul seeming burdened
lesser weight lesser woe
carried speed wind
sight three taken
fishermen corinth thought
length another ship seiz us
knowing hap save
gave healthful welcome ship wrack guests
would reft fishers prey
bark slow sail
therefore homeward bend course
thus heard sever bliss
misfortunes life prolong
tell sad stories mishaps

favour dilate full
befall n thee till

brother importun

must end story life
happy timely death
could travels warrant live

bear extremity dire mishap

enter antipholus syracuse

upon bargain give

antipholus syracuse

use fool chat
sauciness jest upon love
make common serious hours

creep crannies hides beams
jest know aspect
fashion demeanour looks
beat method sconce

shall tell

many man hath hair wit

dromio syracuse
man hath wit lose hair

antipholus syracuse
thou didst conclude hairy men plain dealers without wit

dromio syracuse

jollity

reason

two sound ones

sure ones

name

nature

bald followers

soft wafts us yonder

enter adriana luciana

adriana
ay ay antipholus look strange frown
mistress hath thy sweet aspects
adriana thy wife
time thou unurg wouldst vow
never words music thine ear
never object pleasing thine eye
never touch well welcome thy hand
never meat sweet savour thy taste
unless spake look touch carv thee
comes husband comes
thou art estranged thyself
thyself call strange
undividable incorporate
better thy dear self better part
ah tear away thyself
know love easy mayst thou fall
drop water breaking gulf
take unmingled thence drop
without addition diminishing
take thyself
dearly would touch thee quick
st thou hear licentious
body consecrate thee
ruffian lust contaminate
wouldst thou spit spurn
hurl name husband face
tear stain skin harlot brow
false hand cut wedding ring
break deep divorcing vow
know thou canst therefore see thou
possess adulterate blot
blood mingled crime lust
two one thou play false
digest poison thy flesh
strumpeted thy contagion
keep fair league truce thy true bed
live distain thou undishonoured

antipholus syracuse
plead fair dame know
ephesus two hours old
strange unto town talk
every word wit scann
wants wit one word understand

luciana
fie brother world chang
wont use sister thus
sent dromio home dinner

antipholus syracuse
dromio

dromio syracuse

thee thou didst return
buffet thee blows
denied house wife

course drift compact

antipholus syracuse
villain thou liest even words
didst thou deliver mart

dromio syracuse
never spake life

antipholus syracuse
thus call us names
unless inspiration

adriana
ill agrees gravity
counterfeit thus grossly slave
abetting thwart mood
wrong exempt
wrong wrong contempt
come fasten sleeve thine
thou art elm husband vine
whose weakness married thy stronger state
makes thy strength communicate
aught possess thee dross
usurping ivy brier idle moss
want pruning intrusion
infect thy sap live thy confusion

antipholus syracuse
speaks moves theme
married dream
sleep think hear
error drives eyes ears amiss
know sure uncertainty
entertain offer fallacy

know well knows

put finger eye weep

shrive thousand idle pranks

say dines forth let creature enter

known unto disguis

act iii

scene

enter antipholus ephesus man dromio ephesus angelo
goldsmith balthasar merchant

antipholus ephesus
good signior angelo must excuse us
wife shrewish keep hours
say linger shop
see making carcanet
tomorrow bring home
villain would face
met mart beat
charg thousand marks gold
deny wife house
thou drunkard thou didst thou mean

dromio ephesus
say sir know know
beat mart hand show
skin parchment blows gave ink
handwriting would tell think

antipholus ephesus
think thou art ass

dromio ephesus
marry doth appear
wrongs suffer blows bear
kick kick pass
would keep heels beware ass

antipholus ephesus
sad signior balthasar pray god cheer
may answer good good welcome

balthasar
hold dainties cheap sir welcome dear

antipholus ephesus
signior balthasar either flesh fish
table full welcome makes scarce one dainty dish

balthasar
good meat sir common every churl affords

antipholus ephesus
welcome common nothing words

balthasar
small cheer great welcome makes merry feast

antipholus ephesus
ay niggardly host sparing guest
though cates mean take good part
better cheer may better heart
soft door lock go bid let us

dromio ephesus
maud bridget marian cicely gillian ginn

dromio syracuse
within mome malt horse capon coxcomb idiot patch
either get thee door sit hatch
dost thou conjure wenches thou call st store
one one many go get thee door

dromio ephesus
patch made porter master stays street

dromio syracuse
let walk whence came lest catch cold feet

antipholus ephesus
talks within ho open door

dromio syracuse
right sir tell tell wherefore

antipholus ephesus
wherefore dinner dined today

dromio syracuse
today must come may

antipholus ephesus
art thou keep st house owe

dromio syracuse
porter time sir name dromio

dromio ephesus
villain thou hast stolen mine office name
one ne er got credit mickle blame
thou hadst dromio today place
thou wouldst chang thy face name thy name ass

enter luce concealed antipholus ephesus companions

tell master

proverb shall set staff

another tell

thy name called luce luce thou hast answer well

enter adriana concealed antipholus ephesus companions

adriana
within door keeps noise

antipholus ephesus
wife might come

adriana

dromio ephesus
went pain master knave would go sore

angelo
neither cheer sir welcome would fain either

balthasar
debating best shall part neither

dromio ephesus
stand door master bid welcome hither

antipholus ephesus
something wind get

dromio ephesus
would say master garments thin
cake warm within stand cold
would make man mad buck bought sold

antipholus ephesus
go fetch something break ope gate

dromio syracuse
break breaking break knave pate

dromio ephesus
man may break word sir words wind
ay break face break behind

dromio syracuse
seems thou want st breaking upon thee hind

dromio ephesus
much upon thee pray thee let

dromio syracuse
ay fowls feathers fish fin

antipholus ephesus
well break go borrow crow

dromio ephesus
crow without feather master mean
fish without fin fowl without feather
crow help us sirrah pluck crow together

antipholus ephesus
go get thee gone fetch iron crow

balthasar
patience sir let
herein war reputation
draw within compass suspect
unviolated honour wife
long experience wisdom
sober virtue years modesty
plead part cause unknown
doubt sir well excuse
time doors made
rul depart patience
let us tiger dinner
evening come alone
know reason strange restraint
strong hand offer break
stirring passage day
vulgar comment made
supposed common rout
yet ungalled estimation
may foul intrusion enter
dwell upon grave dead
slander lives upon succession
ever hous gets possession

antipholus ephesus
prevail depart quiet
despite mirth mean merry
know wench excellent discourse
pretty witty wild yet gentle
dine woman mean
wife protest without desert
hath oftentimes upbraided withal
dinner get home
fetch chain know tis made
bring pray porpentine
house chain bestow
nothing spite wife
upon mine hostess good sir make haste
since mine doors refuse entertain
knock elsewhere see disdain

angelo
meet place hour hence

antipholus ephesus
jest shall cost expense

exeunt

scene ii

enter luciana antipholus syracuse

luciana
may quite forgot
husband office shall antipholus
even spring love thy love springs rot
shall love building grow ruinous
wed sister wealth
wealth sake use kindness
like elsewhere stealth
muffle false love show blindness
let sister read eye
thy tongue thy shame orator
look sweet speak fair become disloyalty
apparel vice like virtue harbinger
bear fair presence though heart tainted
teach sin carriage holy saint
secret false need acquainted
simple thief brags attaint
tis double wrong truant bed
let read thy looks board
shame hath bastard fame well managed
ill deeds doubled evil word
alas poor women make us believe
compact credit love us
though others arm show us sleeve
motion turn may move us
gentle brother get
comfort sister cheer call wife
tis holy sport little vain
sweet breath flattery conquers strife

antipholus syracuse
sweet mistress name else know
wonder hit mine
less knowledge grace show
earth wonder earth divine
teach dear creature think speak
lay open earthy gross conceit
smother errors feeble shallow weak
folded meaning words deceit
soul pure truth labour
make wander unknown field
god would create new
transform power yield
well know
weeping sister wife mine
bed homage owe
far far decline
train sweet mermaid thy note
drown thy sister flood tears
sing siren thyself dote
spread er silver waves thy golden hairs
bed take thee lie
glorious supposition think
gains death hath means die
let love light drowned sink

luciana
mad reason

antipholus syracuse
mad mated know

luciana
fault springeth eye

antipholus syracuse
gazing beams fair sun

luciana
gaze clear sight

antipholus syracuse
good wink sweet love look night

luciana
call love call sister

antipholus syracuse
thy sister sister

luciana
sister

antipholus syracuse

thyself mine self better part
mine eye clear eye dear heart dearer heart
food fortune sweet hope aim
sole earth heaven heaven claim

luciana
sister else

antipholus syracuse
call thyself sister sweet aim thee
thee love thee lead life
thou hast husband yet wife
give thy hand

soft sir hold still
fetch sister get goodwill

exit luciana

enter dromio syracuse

one haunts one

beast beast would
beastly creature lays claim

antipholus syracuse

say sir reverence lean luck match yet
wondrous fat marriage

use put make lamp run
light warrant rags tallow burn

sent whole armadoes carracks ballast nose

claim called dromio swore assured told
privy marks mark shoulder mole
neck great wart left arm amazed ran
witch think breast made faith
heart steel transformed curtal dog made
turn wheel

wind blow way shore
harbour town tonight

everyone knows us know none
tis time think trudge pack gone

fly would wife

antipholus syracuse
none witches inhabit
therefore tis high time hence
doth call husband even soul
doth wife abhor fair sister
possess gentle sovereign grace
enchanting presence discourse
hath almost made traitor
lest guilty self wrong
stop mine ears mermaid song

enter angelo chain

angelo

antipholus syracuse

thought ta en porpentine
chain unfinish made stay thus long

antipholus syracuse

would refuse fair offer chain

streets meets golden gifts

act iv

scene

enter merchant angelo officer

merchant
know since pentecost sum due
since much importun
bound
persia want guilders voyage
therefore make present satisfaction
attach officer

angelo
even sum owe
growing antipholus
instant met
chain five clock
shall receive money
pleaseth walk house
discharge bond thank

enter antipholus ephesus dromio ephesus
courtesan

officer
labour may save see comes

antipholus ephesus
go goldsmith house go thou
buy rope end bestow
among wife confederates
locking doors day
soft see goldsmith get thee gone
buy thou rope bring home

dromio ephesus
buy thousand pound year buy rope

exit dromio

antipholus ephesus
man well holp trusts
promised presence chain
neither chain goldsmith came
belike thought love would last long
chain together therefore came

angelo
saving merry humour note
much chain weighs utmost carat
fineness gold chargeful fashion
doth amount three odd ducats
stand debted gentleman
pray see presently discharg
bound sea stays

antipholus ephesus
furnished present money
besides business town
good signior take stranger house
take chain bid wife
disburse sum receipt thereof
perchance soon

angelo
bring chain

antipholus ephesus
bear lest come time enough

angelo
well sir chain

antipholus ephesus
sir hope
else may return without money

angelo
nay come pray sir give chain
wind tide stays gentleman
blame held long

antipholus ephesus
good lord use dalliance excuse
breach promise porpentine
chid bringing
like shrew first begin brawl

merchant
hour steals pray sir dispatch

angelo
hear importunes chain

antipholus ephesus
give wife fetch money

angelo
come come know gave even
either send chain send token

antipholus ephesus
fie run humour breath
come chain pray let see

merchant

good sir say whe er answer
leave officer

antipholus ephesus
answer answer

angelo
money owe chain

antipholus ephesus
owe none till receive chain

angelo
know gave half hour since

antipholus ephesus
gave none wrong much say

angelo
wrong sir denying
consider stands upon credit

merchant
well officer arrest suit

officer
charge duke name obey

angelo
touches reputation
either consent pay sum
attach officer

antipholus ephesus
consent pay thee never
arrest foolish fellow thou dar st

angelo
thy fee arrest officer
would spare brother case
scorn apparently

officer
arrest sir hear suit

antipholus ephesus
obey thee till give thee bail
sirrah shall buy sport dear
metal shop answer

angelo
sir sir shall law ephesus
notorious shame doubt

enter dromio syracuse bay

dromio syracuse
master bark epidamnum
stays till owner comes aboard
sir bears away fraughtage sir
convey aboard bought
oil balsamum aqua vitae
ship trim merry wind
blows fair land stay nought
owner master

antipholus ephesus
madman thou peevish sheep
ship epidamnum stays

dromio syracuse
ship sent hire waftage

antipholus ephesus
thou drunken slave sent thee rope
told thee purpose end

dromio syracuse
sent rope end soon
sent bay sir bark

antipholus ephesus
debate matter leisure
teach ears list heed
adriana villain hie thee straight
give key tell desk
cover er turkish tapestry
purse ducats let send
tell arrested street
shall bail hie thee slave gone
officer prison till come

exeunt merchant angelo officer antipholus ephesus

dowsabel claim husband
big hope compass
thither must although
servants must masters minds fulfil

scene ii

enter adriana luciana

adriana
ah luciana tempt thee
might st thou perceive austerely eye

look red pale sad merrily

heart meteors tilting face

first denied right

said

st speak fair

patience beseech

deformed crooked old sere
ill fac worse bodied shapeless everywhere
vicious ungentle foolish blunt unkind
stigmatical making worse mind

evil lost wail gone

fiend fairy pitiless rough

back friend shoulder clapper one countermands

one judgment carries poor souls hell

scene iii

enter antipholus syracuse

antipholus syracuse
man meet doth salute
well acquainted friend
everyone doth call name
tender money invite
give thanks kindnesses
offer commodities buy
even tailor call shop
show silks bought
therewithal took measure body
sure imaginary wiles
lapland sorcerers inhabit

enter dromio syracuse

dromio syracuse
master gold sent
got picture old adam new apparelled

antipholus syracuse
gold adam dost thou mean

dromio syracuse
adam kept paradise adam keeps
prison goes calf skin killed
prodigal came behind sir like evil angel bid
forsake liberty

antipholus syracuse
understand thee

dromio syracuse
tis plain case went like bass viol case
leather man sir gentlemen tired gives
sob rests sir takes pity decayed men gives
suits durance sets rest exploits
mace morris pike

antipholus syracuse
thou mean st officer

dromio syracuse
ay sir sergeant band brings man answer
breaks band one thinks man always going bed
says god give good rest

antipholus syracuse

tonight may gone

dromio syracuse
sir brought word hour since bark expedition
put forth tonight hindered sergeant tarry
hoy delay angels sent deliver

fellow distract
wander illusions
blessed power deliver us hence

enter courtesan

courtesan

see sir found goldsmith
chain promis today

master mistress satan

devil

fire fire burn ergo light wenches burn come near

exeunt antipholus syracuse dromio syracuse

courtesan
doubt antipholus mad
else would never demean
ring hath mine worth forty ducats
promis chain
one denies
reason gather mad
besides present instance rage
mad tale told today dinner
doors shut entrance
belike wife acquainted fits
purpose shut doors way
way hie home house
tell wife lunatic
rush house took perforce
ring away course fittest choose
forty ducats much lose

exit

scene iv

enter antipholus ephesus officer

antipholus ephesus
fear man break away
give thee ere leave thee much money
warrant thee rested
wife wayward mood today
lightly trust messenger
attach ephesus
tell twill sound harshly ears

enter dromio ephesus rope end

comes man think brings money
sir sent

antipholus ephesus
thou whoreson senseless villain

antipholus ephesus
thou art sensible nothing blows ass

dromio ephesus
ass indeed may prove long ears served
hour nativity instant nothing
hands service blows cold heats
beating warm cools beating waked
sleep raised sit driven doors
go home welcomed home return nay bear
shoulders beggar wont brat think hath
lamed shall beg door door

enter adriana luciana courtesan schoolmaster called pinch

beats

please demand

scene ii corioli senate house

enter tullus aufidius senators corioli

first senator opinion aufidius
rome ent red counsels
know proceed
aufidius
ever thought state
could brought bodily act ere rome
circumvention four days gone
since heard thence words think
letter yes
reads press power known
whether east west dearth great
people mutinous rumour
cominius marcius old enemy
rome worse hated
titus lartius valiant roman
three lead preparation
whither bent likely
consider
first senator army field
never yet made doubt rome ready
answer us

needs must show hatching

shall short ned aim

know afoot

th prepar us

till one

scene iii rome marcius house

enter volumnia virgilia mother wife marcius set
two low stools sew

volumnia pray daughter sing express
comfortable sort son husband freelier
rejoice absence wherein honour
embracements bed would show love yet
tender bodied son womb youth
comeliness pluck gaze way day
kings entreaties mother sell hour
beholding considering honour would become person
better picture like hang th wall
renown made stir pleas let seek danger
find fame cruel war sent whence
return brows bound oak tell thee daughter
sprang joy first hearing man child
first seeing proved man
virgilia died business madam
volumnia good report son therein
would found issue hear profess sincerely dozen
sons love alike none less dear thine
good marcius rather eleven die nobly country
one voluptuously surfeit action

enter gentlewoman

gentlewoman madam lady valeria come visit
virgilia beseech give leave retire
volumnia indeed shall
methinks hear hither husband drum
see pluck aufidius th hair
children bear volsces shunning
methinks see stamp thus call thus
come cowards got fear
though born rome bloody brow
mail hand wiping forth goes
like harvest man task mow
lose hire
virgilia bloody brow jupiter blood
volumnia away fool becomes man
gilt trophy breasts hecuba
suckle hector look lovelier
hector forehead spit forth blood
grecian sword contemning tell valeria

scene iii wales mountainous country cave

enter cave belarius guiderius arviragus

belarius
goodly day keep house
whose roof low stoop boys gate

morning holy office gates monarchs

house th rock yet use thee hardly

arviragus
hail heaven

belarius

perceive like crow
place lessens sets
may revolve tales told
courts princes tricks war
service service done
allow apprehend thus
draws us profit things see
often comfort shall find
sharded beetle safer hold
full wing eagle life
nobler attending check
richer nothing robe

gain cap makes fine
yet keeps book uncross life

guiderius

stiff age unto us

speak
know city usuries
felt knowingly art th court
hard leave keep whose top climb
certain falling slipp ry

pain seems seek danger

hath oft sland rous epitaph

exeunt guiderius arviragus

hard hide sparks nature
boys know little sons th king

beyond trick others polydore

ready gibes quick answer saucy

act v

scene britain roman camp

enter posthumus alone bloody handkerchief

posthumus
yea bloody cloth keep thee wish
thou shouldst colour thus married ones
take course many
must murder wives much better
wrying little pisanio
every good servant commands
bond ones gods
ta en vengeance faults never
liv put saved
noble imogen repent struck
wretch worth vengeance alack
snatch hence little faults love
fall permit
second ills ills elder worse
make dread doers thrift
imogen best wills
make blest obey brought hither
among th italian gentry fight
lady kingdom tis enough
britain kill thy mistress peace
give wound thee therefore good heavens
hear patiently purpose disrobe
italian weeds suit
britain peasant fight
part come die
thee imogen even life
every breath death thus unknown
pitied hated face peril
dedicate let make men know
valour habits show
gods put strength th leonati
shame guise th world begin
fashion less without within

scene ii room castle

enter king queen rosencrantz guildenstern attendants

king
welcome dear rosencrantz guildenstern
moreover much long see
need use provoke
hasty sending something heard
hamlet transformation call
since th exterior inward man
resembles
father death thus hath put
much th understanding
dream entreat
young days brought
since neighbour youth humour
vouchsafe rest court

player king
full thirty times hath phoebus cart gone round
neptune salt wash tellus orbed ground

since love hearts hymen hands
unite commutual sacred bands

scene england wales

act

scene london room palace

enter king henry westmoreland sir walter blunt others

king
shaken wan care
find time frighted peace pant
breathe short winded accents new broils
commenced strands afar remote
thirsty entrance soil
shall daub lips children blood
shall trenching war channel fields
bruise flowerets armed hoofs
hostile paces opposed eyes
like meteors troubled heaven
one nature one substance bred
lately meet intestine shock
furious close civil butchery
shall mutual well beseeming ranks
march one way opposed
acquaintance kindred allies
edge war like ill sheathed knife
shall cut master therefore friends
far sepulchre christ
whose soldier whose blessed cross
impressed engaged fight
forthwith power english shall levy
chase pagans holy fields
whose acres walk blessed feet
fourteen hundred years ago nail
advantage bitter cross
purpose twelvemonth old
bootless tis tell go
therefore meet let hear
gentle cousin westmoreland
yesternight council decree
forwarding dear expedience

westmoreland
liege haste hot question
many limits charge set
yesternight athwart came
post wales loaden heavy news
whose worst noble mortimer
leading men herefordshire fight
th irregular wild glendower
rude hands welshman taken
thousand people butchered
upon whose dead corpse misuse
beastly shameless transformation
welshwomen done may
without much shame told spoken

king
seems tidings broil
brake business holy land

uneven unwelcome news
came north thus import
holy rood day gallant hotspur

holmedon met

brought heat

scene iii warkworth room castle

enter hotspur reading letter

hotspur
mine part lord could well contented
respect love bear house could contented
respect love bears house
shows loves barn better loves house
let see purpose undertake dangerous
certain tis dangerous take cold sleep drink
tell lord fool nettle danger pluck
flower safety purpose undertake dangerous friends
named uncertain time unsorted whole plot
light counterpoise great opposition say say
say unto shallow cowardly hind
lie lack brain lord plot good
plot ever laid friends true constant good plot good
friends full expectation excellent plot good friends
frosty spirited rogue lord york commends
plot general course action zwounds
rascal could brain lady fan
father uncle lord edmund mortimer lord york
owen glendower besides douglas
letters meet arms ninth next month
set forward already pagan rascal
infidel ha shall see sincerity fear
cold heart king lay open proceedings
could divide go buffets moving dish
skimm milk honourable action hang let tell
king prepared set forward night

enter lady percy

kate must leave within two hours

lady percy
good lord thus alone
offence fortnight
banish woman harry bed
tell sweet lord takes thee
thy stomach pleasure thy golden sleep
dost thou bend thine eyes upon earth
start often thou sitt st alone
hast thou lost fresh blood thy cheeks
given treasures rights thee
thick eyed musing curst melancholy
thy faint slumbers thee watch
heard thee murmur tales iron wars
speak terms manage thy bounding steed
cry courage field thou hast talk
sallies retires trenches tents
palisadoes frontiers parapets
basilisks cannon culverin
prisoners ransomed soldiers slain
currents heady fight
thy spirit within thee hath war
thus hath bestirr thee thy sleep
beads sweat stood upon thy brow
like bubbles late disturbed stream
thy face strange motions appear
see men restrain breath
great sudden hest portents
heavy business hath lord hand
must know else loves

hotspur
ho

know wise yet wise
harry percy wife constant

far trust thee gentle kate

far

exeunt

scene ii london room palace

enter king henry prince henry lords

king
lords give us leave prince wales
must private conference near hand
shall presently need

exeunt lords

know whether god
displeasing service done
secret doom blood
breed revengement scourge
thou dost thy passages life
make believe thou art mark
hot vengeance rod heaven
punish mistreadings tell else
could inordinate low desires
poor base lewd mean attempts
barren pleasures rude society
thou art match withal grafted
accompany greatness thy blood
hold level thy princely heart

prince
please majesty would could
quit offences clear excuse
well doubtless purge
many charged withal
yet extenuation let beg
reproof many tales devised
smiling pick thanks base news mongers
oft ear greatness needs must hear
may things true wherein youth
hath faulty wander irregular
find pardon true submission

king
god pardon thee yet let wonder harry
thy affections hold wing
quite flight thy ancestors
thy place council thou hast rudely lost
thy younger brother supplied
art almost alien hearts
court princes blood
hope expectation thy time
ruin soul every man
prophetically forethink thy fall
lavish presence
common hackney eyes men
stale cheap vulgar company
opinion help crown
still kept loyal possession
left reputeless banishment

fellow mark likelihood
seldom seen could stir
like comet wonder
men would tell children
others would say bolingbroke
stole courtesy heaven
dress humility
pluck allegiance men hearts
loud shouts salutations mouths
even presence crowned king
thus keep person fresh new
presence like robe pontifical
ne er seen wonder state
seldom sumptuous showed like feast
rareness solemnity
skipping king ambled
shallow jesters rash bavin wits
soon kindled soon burnt carded state
mingled royalty capering fools
great name profaned scorns
gave countenance name
laugh gibing boys stand push
every beardless vain comparative
grew companion common streets
enfeoff popularity
dally swallow men eyes
surfeited honey began
loathe taste sweetness whereof little
little much much
occasion seen
cuckoo june
heard regarded seen eyes
sick blunted community
afford extraordinary gaze
bent sun like majesty
shines seldom admiring eyes
rather drowsed hung eyelids
slept face render aspect
cloudy men use adversaries
presence glutted gorged full
line harry stand st thou
thou hast lost thy princely privilege
vile participation eye
weary thy common sight
save mine hath desired see thee
doth would
make blind foolish tenderness

prince
shall hereafter thrice gracious lord


king
world
thou art hour richard
france set foot ravenspurg
even percy
sceptre soul boot
hath worthy interest state
thou shadow succession
right colour like right
doth fill fields harness realm
turns head lion armed jaws
debt years thou
leads ancient lords reverend bishops
bloody battles bruising arms
never dying honour hath got
renowned douglas whose high deeds
whose hot incursions great name arms
holds soldiers chief majority
military title capital
kingdoms acknowledge christ
thrice hath hotspur mars swathing clothes
infant warrior enterprises
discomfited great douglas ta en
enlarged made friend
fill mouth deep defiance
shake peace safety throne
say percy northumberland
th archbishop grace york douglas mortimer
capitulate us
wherefore tell news thee
harry tell thee foes
art near st dearest enemy
thou art like enough vassal fear
base inclination start spleen
fight percy pay
dog heels curtsy frowns
show much thou art degenerate

prince
think shall find
god forgive much sway
majesty good thoughts away
redeem percy head
closing glorious day
bold tell son
wear garment blood
stain favour bloody mask
wash away shall scour shame
shall day whene er lights
child honour renown
gallant hotspur praised knight
unthought harry chance meet
every honour sitting helm
would multitudes head
shames redoubled time come
shall make northern youth exchange
glorious deeds indignities
percy factor good lord
engross glorious deeds behalf
call hall strict account
shall render every glory
yea even slightest worship time
tear reckoning heart
name god promise
perform survive
beseech majesty may salve
long grown wounds intemperance
end life cancels bands
die hundred thousand deaths
ere break smallest parcel vow

king

thou shalt charge sovereign trust herein

good blunt thy looks full speed

thursday march

muse fire would ascend
brightest heaven invention

assume port mars heels

unworthy scaffold bring forth
great object cockpit hold
vasty fields france may cram
within wooden casques
affright air agincourt
pardon since crooked figure may
attest little place million
let us ciphers great accompt

suppose within girdle walls

whose high upreared abutting fronts
perilous narrow ocean parts asunder
piece imperfections thoughts
thousand parts divide one man
make imaginary puissance
think talk horses see
printing proud hoofs th receiving earth
tis thoughts must deck kings
carry jumping er times

subdu saxons seat french

state man divers functions
setting endeavour continual motion
fixed aim butt

one consent may work contrariously

chaces understand well
comes er us wilder days
measuring use made
never valu poor seat england
therefore living hence give ourself
barbarous licence tis ever common

like king show sail greatness
rouse throne france
laid majesty

rise full glory

yea strike dauphin blind look us

hath turn balls gun stones soul

mock mothers sons mock castles

shall cause curse dauphin scorn
lies within god

thousands weep laugh

king henry
hope make sender blush
therefore lords omit happy hour
may give furtherance expedition
thought us france
save god run business
therefore let proportions wars
soon collected things thought upon
may reasonable swiftness add
feathers wings god

therefore let every man task thought

act ii

flourish enter chorus

chorus
youth england fire
silken dalliance wardrobe lies
thrive armourers honour thought
reigns solely breast every man
sell pasture buy horse
following mirror christian kings
winged heels english mercuries
sits expectation air
hides sword hilts unto point
crowns imperial crowns coronets
promis harry followers
french advis good intelligence
dreadful preparation
shake fear pale policy
seek divert english purposes
england model thy inward greatness
like little body mighty heart
mightst thou honour would thee
thy children kind natural
see thy fault france hath thee found
nest hollow bosoms fills
treacherous crowns three corrupted men
one richard earl cambridge second
henry lord scroop masham third
sir thomas grey knight northumberland
gilt france guilt indeed
confirm conspiracy fearful france
hands grace kings must die
hell treason hold promises
ere take ship france southampton
linger patience digest
abuse distance force play
sum paid traitors agreed
king set london scene
transported gentles southampton
playhouse must sit
thence france shall convey safe
bring back charming narrow seas
give gentle pass may
offend one stomach play
till king come forth till
unto southampton shift scene

exit

sworn brothers france let good corporal nym

live longer may rest

scene iii gates

governor citizens walls english forces
enter king henry train

king henry
yet resolves governor town
latest parle admit
therefore best mercy give
like men proud destruction
defy us worst soldier
name thoughts becomes best
begin battery
leave half achieved harfleur
till ashes lie buried
gates mercy shall shut
flesh soldier rough hard heart
liberty bloody hand shall range
conscience wide hell mowing like grass
fresh fair virgins flow ring infants
impious war
array flames like prince fiends
smirch complexion fell feats
enlink waste desolation
cause
pure maidens fall hand
hot forcing violation
rein hold licentious wickedness

may bootless spend vain command
upon enraged soldiers spoil
send precepts leviathan

take pity town people
whiles yet soldiers command
