thou hast traitor thy presence

king henry
drawing villain make thee safe

aumerle
stay thy revengeful hand thou hast cause fear

york
within open door secure foolhardy king
shall love speak treason thy face

scene

london palace

enter tyrrel

tyrrel tyrannous bloody act done
arch deed piteous massacre
ever yet land guilty
dighton forrest suborn
piece ruthless butchery
albeit flesh villains bloody dogs
melted tenderness mild compassion
wept like two children deaths sad story
thus quoth dighton lay gentle babes
thus thus quoth forrest girdling one another
within alabaster innocent arms
lips four red roses stalk
summer beauty kiss
book prayers pillow lay
quoth forrest almost chang mind
devil villain stopp
dighton thus told smothered
replenished sweet work nature
prime creation e er framed
hence gone conscience remorse
could speak left
bear tidings bloody king

enter king richard

comes health sovereign lord
king richard kind tyrrel happy thy news
tyrrel done thing gave charge
beget happiness happy
done
king richard didst thou see dead
tyrrel lord
king richard buried gentle tyrrel
tyrrel chaplain tower hath buried
say truth know
king richard come tyrrel soon supper
thou shalt tell process death
meantime think may thee good
inheritor thy desire
farewell till
tyrrel humbly take leave exit
king richard son clarence pent close
daughter meanly match marriage
sons edward sleep abraham bosom
anne wife hath bid world good night
know britaine richmond aims
young elizabeth brother daughter

two households alike dignity
fair verona lay scene

whose misadventur piteous overthrows
doth death bury parents strife

continuance parents rage
children end nought could remove

er courtiers knees dream curtsies straight

act ii

enter chorus

scene iii friar lawrence cell

enter friar lawrence basket

friar lawrence
ere sun advance burning eye
day cheer night dank dew dry
must upfill osier cage
baleful weeds precious juiced flowers
earth nature mother tomb
burying grave womb
womb children divers kind
sucking natural bosom find
many many virtues excellent
none yet different

earth special good doth give
aught good strain fair use

virtue turns vice misapplied
vice sometime action dignified

full soon canker death eats plant

scene v capulet garden

enter juliet

juliet

half hour promised return
perchance meet

ten times faster glides sun beams
driving back shadows lowering hills

sun upon highmost hill

three long hours yet come
affections warm youthful blood
swift motion ball
words would bandy sweet love

scene vi friar lawrence cell

prince
benvolio began bloody fray

benvolio
tybalt slain romeo hand slay
romeo spoke fair bid bethink
nice quarrel urg withal
high displeasure uttered
gentle breath calm look knees humbly bow
could take truce unruly spleen
tybalt deaf peace tilts
piercing steel bold mercutio breast
hot turns deadly point point
martial scorn one hand beats
cold death aside sends
back tybalt whose dexterity
retorts romeo cries aloud
hold friends friends part swifter tongue
agile arm beats fatal points
twixt rushes underneath whose arm
envious thrust tybalt hit life
stout mercutio tybalt fled
comes back romeo
newly entertain revenge
go like lightning ere
could draw part stout tybalt slain
fell romeo turn fly
truth let benvolio die

lady capulet
kinsman montague

twenty fought black strife

juliet
tell friar thou hear st
unless thou tell may prevent
thy wisdom thou canst give help
thou call resolution wise
knife help presently
god join heart romeo thou hands
ere hand thee romeo seal
shall label another deed
true heart treacherous revolt
turn another shall slay
therefore thy long experienc time
give present counsel behold
twixt extremes bloody knife
shall play empire arbitrating
commission thy years art
could issue true honour bring
long speak long die
thou speak st speak remedy

friar lawrence
hold daughter spy kind hope
craves desperate execution
desperate would prevent
rather marry county paris
thou hast strength slay thyself
likely thou wilt undertake
thing like death chide away shame
cop st death scape
thou dar st give thee remedy

juliet
bid leap rather marry paris
battlements yonder tower
walk thievish ways bid lurk
serpents chain roaring bears
hide nightly charnel house
er cover quite dead men rattling bones
reeky shanks yellow chapless skulls
bid go new made grave
hide dead man shroud
things hear told made tremble
without fear doubt
live unstain wife sweet love

friar lawrence
hold go home merry give consent
marry paris wednesday tomorrow
tomorrow night look thou lie alone
let thy nurse lie thee thy chamber
take thou vial bed
distilled liquor drink thou
presently thy veins shall run
cold drowsy humour pulse
shall keep native progress surcease
warmth breath shall testify thou livest
roses thy lips cheeks shall fade
paly ashes thy eyes windows fall
like death shuts day life
part depriv supple government
shall stiff stark cold appear like death
borrow likeness shrunk death
thou shalt continue two forty hours
awake pleasant sleep
bridegroom morning comes
rouse thee thy bed art thou dead
manner country
thy best robes uncover bier
thou shalt borne ancient vault
kindred capulets lie
meantime thou shalt awake
shall romeo letters know drift
hither shall come
watch thy waking night
shall romeo bear thee hence mantua
shall free thee present shame
inconstant toy womanish fear
abate thy valour acting

juliet
give give tell fear

friar lawrence
hold get gone strong prosperous
resolve send friar speed
mantua letters thy lord

juliet
love give strength strength shall help afford
farewell dear father

hath still tried holy man
laid tomb

whose foul mouth healthsome air breathes

live like
horrible conceit death night
together terror place
vault ancient receptacle
many hundred years bones
buried ancestors pack

lies festering shroud say
hours night spirits resort
alack alack like
early waking loathsome smells
shrieks like mandrakes torn earth
living mortals hearing run mad
wake shall distraught
environed hideous fears
madly play forefathers joints

seeking romeo spit body
upon rapier point stay tybalt stay
romeo romeo romeo drink drink thee

scene padua public place

flourish enter lucentio tranio

lucentio
tranio since great desire
see fair padua nursery arts
arriv fruitful lombardy
pleasant garden great italy
father love leave arm
good thy good company
trusty servant well approv
let us breathe haply institute
course learning ingenious studies
pisa renowned grave citizens
gave father first
merchant great traffic world
vincentio come bentivolii

continue broach jest

act ii

scene padua room baptista house

enter katherina bianca

make bondmaid slave

yea raiment petticoat
command
well know duty elders

thou lov st best see thou dissemble

never yet beheld special face
could fancy

plead shall

jested

strikes

enter baptista

baptista

comes

petruchio
whit find passing gentle
twas told rough coy sullen
find report liar
thou art pleasant gamesome passing courteous
slow speech yet sweet spring time flowers
thou canst frown thou canst look askance
bite lip angry wenches
hast thou pleasure cross talk
thou mildness entertain st thy wooers
gentle conference soft affable
world report kate doth limp
sland rous world kate like hazel twig
straight slender brown hue
hazel nuts sweeter kernels
let see thee walk thou dost halt

petruchio

kate chamber princely gait
thou dian let kate
let kate chaste dian sportful

wise

yes keep warm

petruchio

therefore setting chat aside
thus plain terms father hath consented
shall wife dowry greed
nill marry
kate husband turn
light whereby see thy beauty
thy beauty doth make like thee well
thou must married man
born tame kate
bring wild kate kate
conformable household kates

talk talk amiss
curst policy
froward modest dove
hot temperate morn

roman lucrece chastity
conclude greed well together
upon sunday wedding day

hark petruchio says see thee hang first

pleas

shall still curst company
tell tis incredible believe
much loves kindest kate
hung neck kiss kiss
vied fast protesting oath oath
twink love
novices tis world see
tame men women alone

buy apparel gainst wedding day
provide feast father bid guests
sure katherine shall fine

tranio

twill bring gain perish seas

baptista younger daughter

neighbour suitor first

tranio
one love bianca
words witness thoughts guess

gremio

tranio

gremio

skipper stand back tis age nourisheth

tranio
youth ladies eyes flourisheth

baptista
content gentlemen compound strife
tis deeds must win prize
assure daughter greatest dower
shall bianca love
say signior gremio assure

gremio
first know house within city
richly furnished plate gold
basins ewers lave dainty hands
hangings tyrian tapestry
ivory coffers stuff crowns
cypress chests arras counterpoints
costly apparel tents canopies
fine linen turkey cushions boss pearl
valance venice gold needlework
pewter brass things belong
house housekeeping farm
hundred milch kine pail
six score fat oxen standing stalls
things answerable portion
struck years must confess
die tomorrow
whilst live mine

tranio
came well sir list
father heir son
may daughter wife
leave houses three four good
within rich pisa walls anyone
old signior gremio padua
besides two thousand ducats year
fruitful land shall jointure
pinch signior gremio

gremio
two thousand ducats year land
land amounts much
shall besides argosy
lying marseilles road
chok argosy

tranio
gremio tis known father hath less
three great argosies besides two galliasses
twelve tight galleys assure
twice much whate er thou offer st next

gremio
nay offer

like shall mine

tranio
maid mine world
firm promise gremio vied

baptista
must confess offer best
let father make assurance
else must pardon
die dower

tranio
cavil old young

gremio
may young men die well old

baptista
well gentlemen
thus resolv sunday next know
daughter katherine married
sunday following shall bianca
bride make assurance
signior gremio
take leave thank

gremio
adieu good neighbour

exit baptista

fear thee
sirrah young gamester father fool
give thee waning age
set foot thy table tut toy
old italian fox kind boy

exit

tranio
vengeance crafty wither hide
yet fac card ten
tis head master good
see reason suppos lucentio
must get father call suppos vincentio
wonder fathers commonly
get children case wooing
child shall get sire fail cunning

exit




act iii

scene padua room baptista house

enter lucentio hortensio bianca

lucentio
fiddler forbear grow forward sir
soon forgot entertainment
sister katherine welcome withal

hortensio
wrangling pedant
patroness heavenly harmony
give leave prerogative
music spent hour
lecture shall leisure much

lucentio
preposterous ass never read far
know cause music ordain
refresh mind man
studies usual pain
give leave read philosophy
pause serve harmony

hortensio
sirrah bear braves thine

bianca
gentlemen double wrong
strive resteth choice
breeching scholar schools
tied hours pointed times
learn lessons please
cut strife sit
take instrument play whiles
lecture done ere tun

hortensio
leave lecture tune

retires

lucentio
never tune instrument

bianca
left last

lucentio
madam
hic ibat simois hic est sigeia tellus
hic steterat priami regia celsa senis

bianca
construe

lucentio
hic ibat told simois lucentio hic est
son unto vincentio pisa sigeia tellus disguised thus get
love hic steterat lucentio comes wooing priami
man tranio regia bearing port celsa senis
might beguile old pantaloon

hortensio returning
madam instrument tune

bianca
let hear

hortensio plays

fie treble jars

lucentio
spit hole man tune

bianca
let see construe hic ibat simois know
hic est sigeia tellus trust hic steterat priami take
heed hear us regia presume celsa senis despair

hortensio
madam tis tune

lucentio
base

hortensio
base right tis base knave jars
aside fiery forward pedant
life knave doth court love
pedascule watch better yet

bianca
time may believe yet mistrust

lucentio
mistrust sure acides
ajax call grandfather

bianca
must believe master else promise
arguing still upon doubt
let rest licio
good master take unkindly pray
thus pleasant

hortensio
lucentio may go walk give leave
lessons make music three parts

lucentio
formal sir well must wait
aside watch withal deceiv
fine musician groweth amorous

hortensio
madam touch instrument
learn order fingering
must begin rudiments art
teach gamut briefer sort
pleasant pithy effectual
hath taught trade
writing fairly drawn

bianca
past gamut long ago

hortensio
yet read gamut hortensio

bianca
gamut ground accord
plead hortensio passion
b mi bianca take thy lord
c fa ut loves affection
sol one clef two notes
e la mi show pity die
call gamut tut like
old fashions please best nice
change true rules odd inventions


enter servant

servant
mistress father prays leave books
help dress sister chamber
know tomorrow wedding day

bianca
farewell sweet masters must gone

exeunt bianca servant

lucentio
faith mistress cause stay

exit

hortensio
cause pry pedant
methinks looks though love
yet thy thoughts bianca humble
cast thy wand ring eyes every stale
seize thee list find thee ranging
hortensio quit thee changing

exit




scene ii baptista house

enter baptista gremio tranio katherina bianca lucentio
attendants

baptista tranio
signior lucentio pointed day
katherine petruchio married
yet hear son law
said mockery
want bridegroom priest attends
speak ceremonial rites marriage
says lucentio shame

katherina
shame mine must forsooth forc
give hand oppos heart
unto mad brain rudesby full spleen
woo haste means wed leisure
told frantic fool
hiding bitter jests blunt behaviour
noted merry man
woo thousand point day marriage
make friends invite proclaim banns
yet never means wed hath woo
must world point poor katherine
say lo mad petruchio wife
would please come marry

tranio
patience good katherine baptista
upon life petruchio means well
whatever fortune stays word
though blunt know passing wise
though merry yet withal honest

katherina
would katherine never seen though

exit weeping followed bianca others

baptista
go girl blame thee weep
injury would vex saint
much shrew thy impatient humour


enter biondello

master master news old news news never heard

baptista
new old may

biondello
news hear petruchio coming

baptista
come

biondello
sir

baptista


biondello
coming

baptista


biondello
stands sees

tranio
say thine old news

biondello
petruchio coming new hat old jerkin pair old
breeches thrice turned pair boots candle cases
one buckled another laced old rusty sword ta en town
armoury broken hilt chapeless two broken points
horse hipped old mothy saddle stirrups kindred
besides possessed glanders like mose chine
troubled lampass infected fashions full
windgalls sped spavins rayed yellows past cure
fives stark spoiled staggers begnawn bots swayed
back shoulder shotten near legged
half checked bit head stall sheep leather
restrained keep stumbling hath often burst
repaired knots one girth six times pieced woman crupper
velure hath two letters name fairly set
studs pieced pack thread

baptista
comes

biondello
sir lackey world caparisoned like horse
linen stock one leg kersey boot hose gartered
red blue list old hat humour forty fancies
prick feather monster monster apparel
like christian footboy gentleman lackey

tranio
tis odd humour pricks fashion
yet oftentimes lie goes mean apparell

baptista
glad come howsoe er comes

biondello
sir comes

baptista
didst thou say comes

biondello
petruchio came

baptista
ay petruchio came

biondello
sir say horse comes back

baptista
one

biondello
nay saint jamy
hold penny
horse man
one
yet many


enter petruchio grumio

petruchio
come gallants home

baptista
welcome sir

petruchio
yet come well

baptista
yet halt

tranio
well apparell wish

petruchio
better rush thus
kate lovely bride
father gentles methinks frown
wherefore gaze goodly company
saw wondrous monument
comet unusual prodigy

baptista
sir know wedding day
first sad fearing would come
sadder come unprovided
fie doff habit shame estate
eye sore solemn festival

tranio
tell us occasion import
hath long detain wife
sent hither unlike

petruchio
tedious tell harsh hear
sufficeth come keep word
though part enforced digress
leisure excuse
shall well satisfied withal
kate stay long
morning wears tis time church

tranio
see bride unreverent robes
go chamber put clothes mine

petruchio
believe thus visit

baptista
thus trust marry

petruchio
good sooth even thus therefore ha done words
married unto clothes
could repair wear
change poor accoutrements
twere well kate better
fool chat
bid good morrow bride
seal title lovely kiss

exeunt petruchio grumio biondello

tranio
hath meaning mad attire
persuade possible
put better ere go church

baptista
see event

exeunt baptista gremio attendants

tranio
sir love concerneth us add
father liking bring pass
imparted worship
get man whate er
skills much fit turn
shall vincentio pisa
make assurance padua
greater sums promised
shall quietly enjoy hope
marry sweet bianca consent

lucentio
fellow schoolmaster
doth watch bianca steps narrowly
twere good methinks steal marriage
perform let world say
keep mine despite world

tranio
degrees mean look
watch vantage business
reach greybeard gremio
narrow prying father minola
quaint musician amorous licio
master sake lucentio


enter gremio

signior gremio came church

gremio
willingly e er came school

tranio
bride bridegroom coming home

gremio
bridegroom say tis groom indeed
grumbling groom girl shall find

tranio
curster tis impossible

gremio
devil devil fiend

tranio
devil devil devil dam

gremio
tut lamb dove fool
tell sir lucentio priest
ask katherine wife
ay gogs wouns quoth swore loud
amaz priest let fall book
stoop take
mad brain bridegroom took cuff
fell priest book book priest
take quoth list

tranio
said wench rose

gremio
trembled shook stamp swore
vicar meant cozen
many ceremonies done
calls wine health quoth
abroad carousing mates
storm quaff muscadel
threw sops sexton face
reason
beard grew thin hungerly
seem ask sops drinking
done took bride neck
kiss lips clamorous smack
parting church echo
seeing came thence shame
know rout coming
mad marriage never
hark hark hear minstrels play

music plays

enter petrucio katherina bianca baptista hortensio grumio
train

petruchio
gentlemen friends thank pains
know think dine today
prepar great store wedding cheer
haste doth call hence
therefore mean take leave

baptista
possible away tonight

petruchio
must away today night come
make wonder knew business
would entreat rather go stay
honest company thank
beheld give away
patient sweet virtuous wife
dine father drink health
must hence farewell

tranio
let us entreat stay till dinner

petruchio
may

gremio
let entreat

petruchio


katherina
let entreat

petruchio
content

katherina
content stay

petruchio
content shall entreat stay
yet stay entreat

katherina
love stay

petruchio
grumio horse

grumio
ay sir ready oats eaten horses

katherina
nay
thou canst go today
tomorrow till please
door open sir lies way
may jogging whiles boots green
gone till please
tis like prove jolly surly groom
take first roundly

petruchio
kate content thee prithee angry

katherina
angry hast thou
father quiet shall stay leisure

gremio
ay marry sir begins work

katherina
gentlemen forward bridal dinner
see woman may made fool
spirit resist

petruchio
shall go forward kate thy command
obey bride attend
go feast revel domineer
carouse full measure maidenhead
mad merry go hang
bonny kate must
nay look big stamp stare fret
master mine
goods chattels house
household stuff field barn
horse ox ass anything
stands touch whoever dare
bring mine action proudest
stops way padua grumio
draw forth thy weapon beset thieves
rescue thy mistress thou man
fear sweet wench shall touch thee kate
buckler thee million

exeunt petrucio katherina grumio

baptista
nay let go couple quiet ones

gremio
went quickly die laughing

tranio
mad matches never like

lucentio
mistress opinion sister

bianca
mad madly mated

gremio
warrant petruchio kated

baptista
neighbours friends though bride bridegroom wants
supply places table
know wants junkets feast
lucentio shall supply bridegroom place
let bianca take sister room

tranio
shall sweet bianca practise bride

baptista
shall lucentio come gentlemen let go

exeunt




act iv

scene hall petruchio country house

enter grumio

grumio
fie fie tired jades mad masters foul ways
ever man beaten ever man ray ever man weary
sent make fire coming warm
little pot soon hot lips might freeze
teeth tongue roof mouth heart belly ere
come fire thaw blowing fire shall
warm considering weather taller man
take cold holla ho curtis

enter curtis

curtis
calls coldly

grumio
piece ice thou doubt thou mayst slide shoulder
heel greater run head neck fire good
curtis

curtis
master wife coming grumio

grumio
ay curtis ay therefore fire fire cast water

curtis
hot shrew reported

grumio
good curtis frost thou knowest winter tames
man woman beast hath tamed old master new
mistress fellow curtis

curtis
away three inch fool beast

grumio
three inches thy horn foot long
least wilt thou make fire shall complain thee
mistress whose hand hand thou shalt soon feel
thy cold comfort slow thy hot office

curtis
prithee good grumio tell goes world

grumio
cold world curtis every office thine therefore fire
thy duty thy duty master mistress almost
frozen death

curtis
fire ready therefore good grumio news

grumio
jack boy ho boy much news wilt thou

curtis
come full cony catching

grumio
therefore fire caught extreme cold cook
supper ready house trimmed rushes strewed cobwebs swept
servingmen new fustian white stockings every
officer wedding garment jacks fair within jills
fair without carpets laid everything order

curtis
ready therefore pray thee news

grumio
first know horse tired master mistress fallen

curtis


grumio
saddles dirt thereby hangs tale

curtis
let ha good grumio

grumio
lend thine ear

curtis


grumio
striking

curtis
tis feel tale hear tale

grumio
therefore tis called sensible tale cuff
knock ear beseech listening begin imprimis
came foul hill master riding behind mistress

curtis
one horse

grumio
thee

curtis
horse

grumio
tell thou tale hadst thou crossed thou shouldst
heard horse fell horse thou shouldst
heard miry place bemoiled left
horse upon beat horse stumbled
waded dirt pluck swore
prayed never prayed cried horses ran away
bridle burst lost crupper many things
worthy memory shall die oblivion thou return
unexperienced thy grave

curtis
reckoning shrew

grumio
ay thou proudest shall find comes
home talk call forth nathaniel joseph nicholas
philip walter sugarsop rest let heads sleekly
combed blue coats brush garters indifferent
knit let curtsy left legs presume touch
hair master horse tail till kiss hands
ready

curtis


grumio
call forth

curtis
hear ho must meet master countenance mistress

grumio
hath face

curtis
knows

grumio
thou seems calls company countenance

curtis
call forth credit

grumio
comes borrow nothing


enter four five servants

welcome home grumio

grumio

grumio

fellow grumio

old lad

greeting spruce companions ready things neat

things ready near master

e en hand alighted therefore
cock passion silence hear master


enter petrucio katherina

petruchio
knaves man door
hold stirrup take horse
nathaniel gregory philip

servants
sir sir

sir sir sir sir
logger headed unpolish grooms

peasant swain whoreson malt horse drudge

bring along rascal knaves thee

gabriel pumps unpink heel
link colour peter hat
walter dagger come sheathing
none fine adam ralph gregory
rest ragged old beggarly
yet come meet

go rascals go fetch supper

life late led
sit kate welcome
food food food food


enter servants supper

say nay good sweet kate merry

strikes

exit servant

one kate must kiss acquainted
slippers shall water
come kate wash welcome heartily

servant lets ewer fall petruchio strikes

whoreson villain let fall

katherina
patience pray twas fault unwilling

petruchio
whoreson beetle headed flap ear knave
come kate sit know stomach
give thanks sweet kate else shall
mutton

first servant
ay

petruchio
brought

peter


petruchio
tis burnt meat
dogs rascal cook
durst villains bring dresser
serve thus love

throws meat etc

take trenchers cups
heedless joltheads unmanner slaves
grumble straight

katherina
pray husband disquiet
meat well contented

petruchio
tell thee kate twas burnt dried away
expressly forbid touch
engenders choler planteth anger
better twere us fast
since choleric
feed roasted flesh
patient tomorrow shall mended
night fast company
come bring thee thy bridal chamber

exeunt petruchio katherina curtis

nathaniel
peter didst ever see like

peter
kills humour


enter curtis

grumio


curtis
chamber making sermon continency
rails swears rates poor soul
knows way stand look speak
sits one new risen dream
away away coming hither

exeunt

enter petruchio

petruchio
thus politicly begun reign
tis hope end successfully
falcon sharp passing empty
till stoop must full gorg
never looks upon lure
another way man haggard
make come know keeper call
watch watch kites
bate beat obedient
eat meat today none shall eat
last night slept tonight shall
meat undeserved fault
find making bed
fling pillow bolster
way coverlet another way sheets
ay amid hurly intend
done reverend care
conclusion shall watch night
chance nod rail brawl
clamour keep still awake
way kill wife kindness
thus curb mad headstrong humour
knows better tame shrew
let speak tis charity show

exit




scene ii padua baptista house

enter tranio hortensio

tranio
possible friend licio mistress bianca
doth fancy lucentio
tell sir bears fair hand

hortensio
sir satisfy said
stand mark manner teaching

stand aside

enter bianca lucentio

lucentio
mistress profit read

bianca
master read first resolve

lucentio
read profess art love

bianca
may prove sir master art

lucentio
sweet dear prove mistress heart

retire

hortensio
quick proceeders marry tell pray
durst swear mistress bianca
lov none world well lucentio

tranio
despiteful love unconstant womankind
tell thee licio wonderful

hortensio
mistake licio
musician seem
one scorn live disguise
one leaves gentleman
makes god cullion
know sir call hortensio

tranio
signior hortensio often heard
entire affection bianca
since mine eyes witness lightness
contented
forswear bianca love ever

hortensio
see kiss court signior lucentio
hand firmly vow
never woo forswear
one unworthy former favours
fondly flatter withal

tranio
take like unfeigned oath
never marry though would entreat
fie see beastly doth court

hortensio
would world quite forsworn
may surely keep mine oath
married wealthy widow
ere three days pass hath long lov
lov proud disdainful haggard
farewell signior lucentio
kindness women beauteous looks
shall win love take leave
resolution swore

exit hortensio lucentio bianca advance

tranio
mistress bianca bless grace
longeth lover blessed case
nay ta en napping gentle love
forsworn hortensio

bianca
tranio jest forsworn

tranio
mistress

lucentio
rid licio

shall woo wedded day

tranio
ay tame

bianca

tranio

teacheth tricks eleven twenty long
tame shrew charm chattering tongue


enter biondello running

biondello
master master watch long
dog weary last spied
ancient angel coming hill
serve turn

tranio
biondello

biondello
master mercatante pedant
know formal apparel
gait countenance surely like father

lucentio
tranio

make glad seem vincentio

right vincentio
take love let alone

exeunt lucentio bianca

enter pedant

pedant
god save sir

tranio
sir welcome
travel far farthest

pedant
sir farthest week two
farther far rome
tripoli god lend life

tranio
countryman pray

pedant
mantua

tranio
mantua sir marry god forbid
come padua careless life

pedant
life sir pray goes hard

tranio
tis death anyone mantua
come padua know cause
ships stay venice duke
private quarrel twixt duke
hath publish proclaim openly
tis marvel newly come
might heard else proclaim

pedant
alas sir worse
bills money exchange
florence must deliver

tranio
well sir courtesy
advise
first tell ever pisa

pedant
ay sir pisa often
pisa renowned grave citizens

tranio
among know one vincentio

pedant
know heard
merchant incomparable wealth

tranio
father sir sooth say
countenance somewhat doth resemble

biondello
aside much apple doth oyster one

tranio
save life extremity
favour sake
think worst fortunes
like sir vincentio
name credit shall undertake
house shall friendly lodg
look take upon
understand sir shall stay
till done business city
courtesy sir accept

pedant
sir repute ever
patron life liberty

tranio
go make matter good
way let understand
father look every day
pass assurance dower marriage
twixt one baptista daughter
circumstances instruct
go clothe becomes

exeunt




scene iii room petruchio house

enter katherina grumio

grumio
forsooth dare life

katherina
wrong spite appears
marry famish
beggars come unto father door
upon entreaty present alms
elsewhere meet charity
never knew entreat
never needed entreat
starv meat giddy lack sleep
oaths kept waking brawling fed
spites wants
name perfect love
say sleep eat
twere deadly sickness else present death
prithee go get repast
care wholesome food

grumio
say neat foot

katherina
tis passing good prithee let

grumio
fear choleric meat
say fat tripe finely broil

katherina
like well good grumio fetch

grumio
tell fear tis choleric
say piece beef mustard

katherina
dish love feed upon

grumio
ay mustard hot little

katherina
beef let mustard rest

grumio
nay shall mustard
else get beef grumio

katherina
one anything thou wilt

grumio
mustard without beef

katherina
go get thee gone thou false deluding slave

beats

feed st name meat
sorrow thee pack
triumph thus upon misery
go get thee gone say


enter petruchio dish meat hortensio

petruchio
fares kate sweeting amort

hortensio
mistress cheer

katherina
faith cold

petruchio
pluck thy spirits look cheerfully upon
love thou seest diligent
dress thy meat bring thee

sets dish table

sure sweet kate kindness merits thanks
word nay thou lov st
pains sorted proof
take away dish

katherina
pray let stand

petruchio
poorest service repaid thanks
shall mine touch meat

katherina
thank sir

hortensio
signior petruchio fie blame
come mistress kate bear company

petruchio
aside eat hortensio thou lovest
much good unto thy gentle heart
kate eat apace honey love
return unto thy father house
revel bravely best
silken coats caps golden rings
ruffs cuffs farthingales things
scarfs fans double change bravery
amber bracelets beads knavery
hast thou din tailor stays thy leisure
deck thy body ruffling treasure


enter tailor

come tailor let us see ornaments
lay forth gown


enter haberdasher

news sir

haberdasher
cap worship bespeak

petruchio
moulded porringer
velvet dish fie fie tis lewd filthy
tis cockle walnut shell
knack toy trick baby cap
away come let bigger

katherina
bigger doth fit time
gentlewomen wear caps

petruchio
gentle shall one
till

hortensio
aside haste

katherina
sir trust may leave speak
speak child babe
betters endur say mind
best stop ears
tongue tell anger heart
else heart concealing break
rather shall free
even uttermost please words

petruchio
thou say st true paltry cap
custard coffin bauble silken pie
love thee well thou lik st

katherina
love love like cap
none

exit haberdasher

petruchio
thy gown ay come tailor let us see
mercy god masquing stuff
sleeve tis like demi cannon
carv like apple tart
snip nip cut slish slash
like censer barber shop
devil name tailor call st thou

hortensio
aside see like neither cap gown

tailor
bid make orderly well
according fashion time

petruchio
marry remember
bid mar time
go hop every kennel home
shall hop without custom sir
none hence make best

katherina
never saw better fashion gown
quaint pleasing commendable
belike mean make puppet

petruchio
true means make puppet thee

tailor
says worship means make puppet

petruchio
monstrous arrogance thou liest thou thread
thou thimble
thou yard three quarters half yard quarter nail
thou flea thou nit thou winter cricket thou
brav mine house skein thread
away thou rag thou quantity thou remnant
shall mete thee thy yard
thou shalt think prating whilst thou liv st
tell thee thou hast marr gown

tailor
worship deceiv gown made
master direction
grumio gave order done

grumio
gave order gave stuff

tailor
desire made

grumio
marry sir needle thread

tailor
request cut

grumio
thou hast faced many things

tailor


grumio
face thou hast braved many men brave neither
fac brav say unto thee bid thy master cut gown
bid cut pieces ergo thou liest

tailor
note fashion testify

petruchio
read

grumio
note lies throat say said

tailor
imprimis loose bodied gown

grumio
master ever said loose bodied gown sew skirts
beat death bottom brown thread said gown

petruchio
proceed

tailor
small compassed cape

grumio
confess cape

tailor
trunk sleeve

grumio
confess two sleeves

tailor
sleeves curiously cut

petruchio
ay villainy

grumio
error bill sir error bill commanded sleeves
cut sew prove upon thee
though thy little finger armed thimble

tailor
true say thee place thou shouldst
know

grumio
thee straight take thou bill give thy mete yard
spare

hortensio
god mercy grumio shall odds

petruchio
well sir brief gown

grumio
right sir tis mistress

petruchio
go take unto thy master use

grumio
villain thy life take mistress gown thy master
use

petruchio
sir conceit

grumio
sir conceit deeper think
take mistress gown master use
fie fie fie

petruchio
aside hortensio say thou wilt see tailor paid
tailor go take hence gone say

hortensio
aside tailor tailor pay thee thy gown tomorrow
take unkindness hasty words
away say commend thy master

exit tailor

petruchio
well come kate unto father
even honest mean habiliments
purses shall proud garments poor
tis mind makes body rich
sun breaks darkest clouds
honour peereth meanest habit
jay precious lark
feathers beautiful
adder better eel
painted skin contents eye
good kate neither art thou worse
poor furniture mean array
thou account st shame lay
therefore frolic hence forthwith
feast sport us thy father house
go call men let us straight
bring horses unto long lane end
mount thither walk foot
let see think tis seven clock
well may come dinner time

katherina
dare assure sir tis almost two
twill supper time ere come

petruchio
shall seven ere go horse
look speak think
still crossing sirs let alone
go today ere
shall clock say

hortensio
gallant command sun

exeunt

katherina
fie fie unknit threatening unkind brow
dart scornful glances eyes
wound thy lord thy king thy governor
blots thy beauty frosts bite meads
confounds thy fame whirlwinds shake fair buds
sense meet amiable
woman mov like fountain troubled
muddy ill seeming thick bereft beauty
none dry thirsty
deign sip touch one drop
thy husband thy lord thy life thy keeper
thy head thy sovereign one cares thee
thy maintenance commits body
painful labour sea land
watch night storms day cold
whilst thou liest warm home secure safe
craves tribute thy hands
love fair looks true obedience
little payment great debt
duty subject owes prince
even woman oweth husband
froward peevish sullen sour
obedient honest
foul contending rebel
graceless traitor loving lord
asham women simple
offer war kneel peace
seek rule supremacy sway
bound serve love obey
bodies soft weak smooth
unapt toil trouble world
soft conditions hearts
well agree external parts
come come froward unable worms
mind hath big one
heart great reason haply
bandy word word frown frown
see lances straws
strength weak weakness past compare
seeming indeed least
vail stomachs boot
place hands husband foot
token duty please
hand ready may ease

wench come kiss kate

scene ii island cell prospero

enter prospero miranda

miranda
art dearest father
put wild waters roar allay
sky seems would pour stinking pitch
sea mounting th welkin cheek
dashes fire suffered
saw suffer brave vessel
doubt noble creature
dash pieces cry knock
heart poor souls perish
god power would
sunk sea within earth ere
good ship swallow
fraughting souls within

prospero
collected
amazement tell piteous heart
harm done

miranda
woe day

prospero
harm
done nothing care thee
thee dear one thee daughter
art ignorant thou art nought knowing
whence better
prospero master full poor cell
thy greater father

miranda
know
never meddle thoughts

prospero
tis time
inform thee farther lend thy hand
pluck magic garment

lays mantle

lie art wipe thou thine eyes comfort
direful spectacle wrack touch
virtue compassion thee
provision mine art
safely ordered soul
much perdition hair
betid creature vessel
thou heard st cry thou saw st sink sit
thou must know farther

miranda
often
begun tell stopp
left bootless inquisition
concluding stay yet

prospero
hour come
minute bids thee ope thine ear
obey attentive canst thou remember
time came unto cell
think thou canst thou wast
three years old

miranda
certainly sir

prospero
house person
anything image tell
hath kept thy remembrance

miranda
tis far
rather like dream assurance
remembrance warrants
four five women tended

prospero
thou hadst miranda
lives thy mind seest thou else
dark backward abysm time
thou rememb rest aught ere thou cam st
thou cam st thou mayst

miranda


prospero
twelve year since miranda twelve year since
thy father duke milan
prince power

miranda
sir father

prospero
thy mother piece virtue
said thou wast daughter thy father
duke milan heir
princess worse issued

miranda
heavens
foul play came thence
blessed

prospero
girl
foul play thou say st heav thence
blessedly holp hither

miranda
heart bleeds
think th teen turn
remembrance please farther

prospero
brother thy uncle call antonio
pray thee mark brother
perfidious next thyself
world lov put
manage state time
signories first
prospero prime duke reputed
dignity liberal arts
without parallel study
government cast upon brother
state grew stranger transported
rapt secret studies thy false uncle
dost thou attend

miranda
sir heedfully

prospero
perfected grant suits
deny advance
trash topping new created
creatures mine say chang em
else new form em key
officer office set hearts th state
tune pleas ear
ivy hid princely trunk
suck verdure thou attend st

miranda
good sir

prospero
pray thee mark
thus neglecting worldly ends dedicated
closeness bettering mind
retir
er priz popular rate false brother
awak evil nature trust
like good parent beget
falsehood contrary great
trust indeed limit
confidence sans bound thus lorded
revenue yielded
power might else exact like one
truth telling
made sinner memory
credit lie believe
indeed duke substitution
executing th outward face royalty
prerogative hence ambition growing
dost thou hear

miranda
tale sir would cure deafness

prospero
screen part play
play needs
absolute milan poor man library
dukedom large enough temporal royalties
thinks incapable confederates
dry sway wi th king naples
give annual tribute homage
subject coronet crown bend
dukedom yet unbow alas poor milan
ignoble stooping

miranda
heavens

prospero
mark condition event tell
might brother

miranda
sin
think nobly grandmother
good wombs borne bad sons

prospero
condition
king naples enemy
inveterate hearkens brother suit
lieu th premises
homage know much tribute
presently extirpate mine
dukedom confer fair milan
honours brother whereon
treacherous army levied one midnight
fated th purpose antonio open
gates milan th dead darkness
ministers th purpose hurried thence
thy crying self

miranda
alack pity
rememb ring cried
cry er hint
wrings mine eyes

prospero
hear little
bring thee present business
upon us without story
impertinent

miranda
wherefore
hour destroy us

prospero
well demanded wench
tale provokes question dear durst
dear love people bore set
mark bloody business
colours fairer painted foul ends
hurried us aboard bark
bore us leagues sea prepared
rotten carcass butt rigg
tackle sail mast rats
instinctively quit hoist us
cry th sea roar us sigh
th winds whose pity sighing back
us loving wrong

miranda
alack trouble


prospero
cherubin
thou wast preserve thou didst smile
infused fortitude heaven
deck sea drops full salt
burden groan rais
undergoing stomach bear
ensue

miranda
came ashore

prospero
providence divine
food fresh water
noble neapolitan gonzalo
charity appointed
master design give us
rich garments linens stuffs necessaries
since steaded much gentleness
knowing lov books furnish
mine library volumes
prize dukedom

miranda
would might
ever see man

prospero
arise
sit still hear last sea sorrow
island arriv
thy schoolmaster made thee profit
princes time
vainer hours tutors careful

miranda
heavens thank pray sir
still tis beating mind reason
raising sea storm

prospero
know thus far forth

scene ii another part island

enter caliban burden wood noise thunder heard

bogs fens flats prosper fall make

yet needs must curse pinch
fright urchin shows pitch mire

sometime like apes mow chatter
bite like hedgehogs

pricks footfall sometime

another storm brewing hear sing th wind yond black

act iii

scene prospero cell

enter ferdinand bearing log

ferdinand
sports painful labour
delight sets kinds baseness
nobly undergone poor matters
point rich ends mean task
would heavy odious
mistress serve quickens dead
makes labours pleasures
ten times gentle father crabbed
compos harshness must remove
thousands logs pile
upon sore injunction sweet mistress
weeps sees work says baseness
never like executor forget
sweet thoughts even refresh labours
busy least

enter miranda prospero behind

miranda
alas pray
work hard would lightning
burnt logs enjoin pile
pray set rest burns
twill weep wearied father
hard study pray rest
safe three hours

ferdinand
dear mistress
sun set shall discharge
must strive

miranda
sit
bear logs pray give
carry pile

ferdinand
precious creature
rather crack sinews break back
dishonour undergo
sit lazy

miranda
would become
well
much ease good

aside poor worm thou art infected

act iv

scene prospero cell

enter prospero ferdinand miranda

live

hast strangely stood test afore heaven

make halt behind

worthily purchas take daughter

make contract grow barren hate
sour ey disdain discord shall bestrew
union bed weeds loathly
shall hate therefore take heed
hymen lamps shall light

masque enter iris

iris
ceres bounteous lady thy rich leas
wheat rye barley vetches oats peas
thy turfy mountains live nibbling sheep
flat meads thatch stover keep
thy banks pioned twilled brims
spongy april thy hest betrims
make cold nymphs chaste crowns thy broom groves
whose shadow dismissed bachelor loves
lass lorn thy pole clipt vineyard
thy sea marge sterile rocky hard
thou thyself dost air queen th sky
whose wat ry arch messenger
bids thee leave sovereign grace
grass plot place
come sport peacocks fly amain
approach rich ceres entertain

enter ceres

ceres
hail many colour messenger ne er
dost disobey wife jupiter
thy saffron wings upon flowers
diffusest honey drops refreshing showers
end thy blue bow dost crown
bosky acres unshrubb
rich scarf proud earth hath thy queen
summon hither short grass green

iris
contract true love celebrate
donation freely estate
blest lovers

ceres

venus son thou dost know
attend queen since plot
means dusky dis daughter got
blind boy scandal company
forsworn

afraid met deity

dove drawn thought done
wanton charm upon man maid
whose vows bed right shall paid
till hymen torch lighted vain

swears shoot play sparrows
boy right

ye elves hills brooks standing lakes
groves

whereof ewe bites whose pastime
make midnight mushrooms rejoice

weak masters though ye bedimm

solem music

enter ariel alonso frantic gesture attended
gonzalo sebastian antonio like manner attended adrian
francisco enter circle prospero made
stand charmed prospero observing speaks

solemn air best comforter
unsettled fancy cure thy brains
useless boil within thy skull stand
spell stopp
holy gonzalo honourable man
mine eyes e en sociable show thine
fall fellowly drops charm dissolves apace
morning steals upon night
melting darkness rising senses
begin chase ignorant fumes mantle
clearer reason good gonzalo
true preserver loyal sir
thou follow st pay thy graces
home word deed cruelly
didst thou alonso use daughter
thy brother furtherer act
thou art pinch sebastian flesh blood
brother mine entertain ambition
expell remorse nature sebastian
whose inward pinches therefore strong
would kill king forgive thee
unnatural though thou art understanding

shortly fill reasonable shores
lie foul muddy one

fetch hat rapier cell

thou shalt ere long free

enter servant wine

servant please lordship wine
lucullus flaminius noted thee always wise thee
flaminius lordship speaks pleasure
lucullus observed thee always towardly prompt spirit
give thee thy due one knows belongs reason
canst use time well time use thee well good parts
thee servant get gone sirrah exit servant draw
nearer honest flaminius thy lord bountiful gentleman
thou art wise thou know st well enough although thou com st
time lend money especially upon bare
friendship without security three solidares thee
good boy wink say thou saw st fare thee well

let molten coin thy damnation
thou disease friend

act iv scene without walls athens

enter timon

girdles wolves dive earth

parents eyes bankrupts hold fast

thy mistress th brothel son sixteen

merely poison nothing bear thee

enter apemantus

scene ii rome titus house

prologue

troy lies scene isles greece
princes orgulous high blood chaf
port athens sent ships
fraught ministers instruments
cruel war sixty nine wore
crownets regal athenian bay
put forth toward phrygia vow made
ransack troy within whose strong immures
ravish helen menelaus queen
wanton paris sleeps quarrel
tenedos come
deep drawing barks disgorge
war like fraughtage dardan plains
fresh yet unbruised greeks pitch
brave pavilions priam six gated city
dardan tymbria ilias chetas troien
antenorides massy staples
corresponsive fulfilling bolts
stir sons troy
expectation tickling skittish spirits
one side trojan greek
sets hazard hither come
prologue arm confidence
author pen actor voice suited
like conditions argument
tell fair beholders play
leaps er vaunt firstlings broils
beginning middle starting thence away
may digested play
like find fault pleasures
good bad tis chance war

scene iii grecian camp agamemnon tent

sennet enter agamemnon nestor ulysses diomedes menelaus
others

agamemnon
princes
grief hath set jaundies er cheeks
ample proposition hope makes
designs begun earth
fails promis largeness checks disasters
grow veins actions highest rear
knots conflux meeting sap
infects sound pine diverts grain
tortive errant course growth
princes matter new us
come short suppose far
seven years siege yet troy walls stand
sith every action hath gone
whereof record trial draw
bias thwart answering aim
unbodied figure thought
gave surmised shape princes
cheeks abash behold works
call shames indeed naught else
protractive trials great jove
find persistive constancy men
fineness metal found
fortune love bold coward
wise fool artist unread
hard soft seem affin kin
wind tempest frown
distinction broad powerful fan
puffing winnows light away
hath mass matter
lies rich virtue unmingled

nestor
due observance thy godlike seat
great agamemnon nestor shall apply
thy latest words reproof chance
lies true proof men sea smooth
many shallow bauble boats dare sail
upon patient breast making way
nobler bulk
let ruffian boreas enrage
gentle thetis anon behold
strong ribb bark liquid mountains cut
bounding two moist elements
like perseus horse saucy boat
whose weak untimber sides even
co rivall greatness either harbour fled
made toast neptune even
doth valour show valour worth divide
storms fortune ray brightness
herd hath annoyance breeze
tiger splitting wind
makes flexible knees knotted oaks
flies fled shade thing courage
rous rage rage doth sympathise
accent tun self key
retorts chiding fortune

ulysses
agamemnon
thou great commander nerve bone greece
heart numbers soul spirit
tempers minds
shut hear ulysses speaks
besides th applause approbation
agamemnon mighty thy place sway
nestor thou reverend thy stretch life
give speeches
agamemnon hand greece
hold high brass
venerable nestor hatch silver
bond air strong axle tree
heaven rides knit greekish ears
experienc tongue yet let please
thou great wise hear ulysses speak

agamemnon
speak prince ithaca less expect
matter needless importless burden
divide thy lips confident
rank thersites opes mastic jaws
shall hear music wit oracle

ulysses
troy yet upon basis
great hector sword lack master
instances
specialty rule hath neglected
look many grecian tents stand
hollow upon plain many hollow factions
general like hive
foragers shall repair
honey expected degree vizarded
th unworthiest shows fairly mask
heavens planets centre
observe degree priority place
insisture course proportion season form
office custom line order
therefore glorious planet sol
noble eminence enthron spher
amidst whose med cinable eye
corrects influence evil planets
posts like commandment king
sans check good bad planets
evil mixture disorder wander
plagues portents mutiny
raging sea shaking earth
commotion winds frights changes horrors
divert crack rend deracinate
unity married calm states
quite fixture degree shak
ladder high designs
enterprise sick could communities
degrees schools brotherhoods cities
peaceful commerce dividable shores
primogenity due birth
prerogative age crowns sceptres laurels
degree stand authentic place
take degree away untune string
hark discord follows thing melts
mere oppugnancy bounded waters
lift bosoms higher shores
make sop solid globe
strength lord imbecility
rude son strike father dead
force right rather right wrong
whose endless jar justice resides
lose names justice
everything includes power
power appetite
appetite universal wolf
doubly seconded power
must make perforce universal prey
last eat great agamemnon
chaos degree suffocate
follows choking
neglection degree
pace goes backward purpose
hath climb general disdain
one step next
next beneath every step
exampl first pace sick
superior grows envious fever
pale bloodless emulation
tis fever keeps troy foot
sinews end tale length
troy weakness stands strength

nestor
wisely hath ulysses discover
fever whereof power sick

agamemnon
nature sickness found ulysses
remedy

ulysses
great achilles opinion crowns
sinew forehand host
ear full airy fame
grows dainty worth tent
lies mocking designs patroclus
upon lazy bed livelong day
breaks scurril jests
ridiculous awkward action
slanderer imitation calls
pageants us sometime great agamemnon
thy topless deputation puts
like strutting player whose conceit
lies hamstring doth think rich
hear wooden dialogue sound
twixt stretch footing scaffoldage
pitied er wrested seeming
acts thy greatness speaks
tis like chime mending terms unsquar
tongue roaring typhon dropp
would seem hyperboles fusty stuff
large achilles press bed lolling
deep chest laughs loud applause
cries excellent tis agamemnon right
play nestor hem stroke thy beard
drest oration
done near extremest ends
parallels like vulcan wife
yet god achilles still cries excellent
tis nestor right play patroclus
arming answer night alarm
forsooth faint defects age
must scene mirth cough spit
palsy fumbling gorget
shake rivet sport
sir valour dies cries enough patroclus
give ribs steel shall split
pleasure spleen fashion
abilities gifts natures shapes
severals generals grace exact
achievements plots orders preventions
excitements field speech truce
success loss serves
stuff two make paradoxes

nestor
imitation twain
ulysses says opinion crowns
imperial voice many infect
ajax grown self bears head
rein full proud place
broad achilles keeps tent like
makes factious feasts rails state war
bold oracle sets thersites
slave whose gall coins slanders like mint
match us comparisons dirt
weaken discredit exposure
rank soever rounded danger

ulysses

count wisdom member war
forestall prescience esteem act

contrive many hands shall strike
fitness calls know measure
observant toil enemies weight
hath finger dignity
call bed work mapp ry closet war
ram batters wall
great swinge rudeness poise

fineness souls
reason guide execution

scene ii troy priam palace

enter priam hector troilus paris helenus

priam
many hours lives speeches spent
thus says nestor greeks
deliver helen damage else
honour loss time travail expense
wounds friends else dear consum
hot digestion cormorant war
shall struck hector say

hector
though man lesser fears greeks
far toucheth particular
yet dread priam
lady softer bowels
spongy suck sense fear
ready cry knows follows
hector wound peace surety
surety secure modest doubt call
beacon wise tent searches
th bottom worst let helen go
since first sword drawn question
every tithe soul mongst many thousand dismes
hath dear helen mean
lost many tenths
guard thing worth us
name value one ten
merit reason denies
yielding

troilus
fie fie brother
weigh worth honour king
great dread father scale
common ounces counters sum
past proportion infinite
buckle waist fathomless
spans inches diminutive
fears reasons fie godly shame

helenus
marvel though bite sharp reasons
empty father
bear great sway affairs reason
speech hath none tells

troilus

fur gloves reason reasons
know enemy intends harm
know sword employ perilous
reason flies object harm
marvels helenus beholds
grecian sword set
wings reason heels
fly like chidden mercury jove
like star disorb nay talk reason
let shut gates sleep manhood honour
hare hearts would fat thoughts
cramm reason reason respect
make livers pale lustihood deject

brother worth doth cost keeping

troilus
aught tis valued

hector

holds estimate dignity
well wherein tis precious
prizer tis mad idolatry

dotes attributive
infectiously affects
without image th affected merit

troilus
take today wife election
led conduct
enkindled mine eyes ears
two traded pilots twixt dangerous shores
judgement may avoid
although distaste elected
wife chose evasion
blench stand firm honour
turn back silks upon merchant
soil remainder viands
throw unrespective sieve
full thought meet
paris vengeance greeks
breath full consent bellied sails
seas winds old wranglers took truce
service touch ports desir
old aunt greeks held captive
brought grecian queen whose youth freshness
wrinkles apollo makes stale morning
keep grecians keep aunt
worth keeping pearl
whose price hath launch thousand ships
turn crown kings merchants
avouch twas wisdom paris went
must needs cried go go
confess brought home worthy prize
must needs clapp hands
cried inestimable
issue proper wisdoms rate
deed never fortune
beggar estimation priz
richer sea land theft base
stol n fear keep
thieves unworthy thing stol n
country disgrace
fear warrant native place

alas single arms

ample power

honey still gall
valiant praise

would soil fair rape

degenerate strain

meanest spirit party

whose life ill bestow death unfam

paris troilus said well
cause question hand
gloz superficially much
unlike young men aristotle thought
unfit hear moral philosophy
reasons allege conduce
hot passion distemp red blood
make free determination
twixt right wrong pleasure revenge
ears deaf adders voice
true decision nature craves
dues rend red owners
nearer debt humanity
wife husband law
nature corrupted affection
great minds partial indulgence
benumbed wills resist
law well order nation
curb raging appetites
disobedient refractory
helen wife sparta king
known moral laws
nature nations speak aloud
back return thus persist
wrong extenuates wrong
makes much heavy hector opinion
way truth yet ne ertheless
spritely brethren propend
resolution keep helen still
tis cause hath mean dependence
upon joint several dignities

troilus

glory affected
performance heaving spleens
would wish drop trojan blood
spent defence worthy hector
theme honour renown

rich advantage promis glory
smiles upon forehead action
wide world revenue

dull factious nobles greeks

thy goodly armour thus hath cost thy life
day work done take breath
rest sword thou hast thy fill blood death

disarms

enter achilles myrmidons

achilles
look hector sun begins set
ugly night comes breathing heels
even vail dark ning sun
close day hector life done

hector
unarm forego vantage greek

achilles
strike fellows strike man seek

hector falls

ilion fall thou next troy sink
lies thy heart thy sinews thy bone
myrmidons cry amain
achilles hath mighty hector slain

retreat sounded

hark retire upon grecian part

myrmidon
trojan trumpets sound like lord

achilles
dragon wing night erspreads earth
stickler like armies separates
half supp sword frankly would fed
pleas dainty bait thus goes bed

sheathes sword

come tie body horse tail
along field trojan trail

exeunt

scene ix another part plain

sound retreat shout enter agamemnon ajax menelaus nestor
diomedes rest marching

scene x another part plain

enter aeneas paris antenor deiphobus

aeneas
stand ho yet masters field
never go home starve night

enter troilus

troilus
hector slain


hector gods forbid

troilus
dead murderer horse tail
beastly sort dragg shameful field
frown heavens effect rage speed
sit gods upon thrones smile troy
say let brief plagues mercy
linger sure destructions

aeneas
lord discomfort host

troilus
understand tell
speak flight fear death
dare imminence gods men
address dangers hector gone
shall tell priam hecuba
let screech owl aye call
go troy say hector dead
word priam turn stone
make wells niobes maids wives
cold statues youth word
scare troy march away
hector dead say
stay yet vile abominable tents
thus proudly pight upon phrygian plains
let titan rise early dare
thou great siz coward
space earth shall sunder two hates
haunt thee like wicked conscience still
mouldeth goblins swift frenzy thoughts
strike free march troy comfort go
hope revenge shall hide inward woe

enter pandarus

pandarus
hear hear

troilus
hence broker lackey ignominy shame
pursue thy life live aye thy name

exeunt pandarus

pandarus
goodly medicine aching bones world world thus poor
agent despis traitors bawds earnestly set work
ill requited endeavour lov
performance loathed verse instance let
see

full merrily humble bee doth sing
till hath lost honey sting
subdu armed trail
sweet honey sweet notes together fail

good traders flesh set painted cloths
many pandar hall
eyes half weep pandar fall
weep yet give groans
though yet aching bones
brethren sisters hold door trade
two months hence shall made
fear
galled goose winchester would hiss
till sweat seek eases
time bequeath diseases

exit

dramatis personae

scene verona milan frontiers mantua

act scene verona open place

enter valentine proteus

valentine cease persuade loving proteus
home keeping youth ever homely wits
affection chains thy tender days
sweet glances thy honour love
rather would entreat thy company
see wonders world abroad
living dully sluggardiz home
wear thy youth shapeless idleness
since thou lov st love still thrive therein
even would love begin
proteus wilt thou gone sweet valentine adieu
think thy proteus thou haply seest
rare noteworthy object thy travel
wish partaker thy happiness
thou dost meet good hap thy danger
ever danger environ thee
commend thy grievance holy prayers
thy headsman valentine
valentine love book pray success
proteus upon book love pray thee
valentine shallow story deep love
young leander cross hellespont
proteus deep story deeper love
shoes love
valentine true boots love
yet never swum hellespont
proteus boots nay give boots
valentine boots thee
proteus
valentine love scorn bought groans
coy looks heart sore sighs one fading moment mirth
twenty watchful weary tedious nights
haply perhaps hapless gain
lost grievous labour
however folly bought wit
else wit folly vanquished
proteus circumstance call fool
valentine circumstance fear prove
proteus love cavil love
valentine love master masters
yoked fool
methinks chronicled wise
proteus yet writers say sweetest bud
eating canker dwells eating love
inhabits finest wits
valentine writers say forward bud
eaten canker ere blow
even love young tender wit
turn folly blasting bud
losing verdure even prime
fair effects future hopes
wherefore waste time counsel
art votary fond desire
adieu father road
expects coming see shipp
proteus thither bring thee valentine
valentine sweet proteus let us take leave
milan let hear thee letters
thy success love news else
betideth absence thy friend
likewise visit thee mine
proteus happiness bechance thee milan
valentine much home farewell
exit valentine
proteus honour hunts love
leaves friends dignify
leave friends love
thou julia thou hast metamorphis
made neglect studies lose time
war good counsel set world nought
made wit musing weak heart sick thought

enter speed

speed sir proteus save saw master
proteus parted hence embark milan
speed twenty one shipp already
play sheep losing
proteus indeed sheep doth often stray
shepherd awhile away
speed conclude master shepherd
sheep
proteus
speed horns horns whether wake sleep
proteus silly answer fitting well sheep
speed proves still sheep
proteus true thy master shepherd
speed nay deny circumstance
proteus shall go hard prove another
speed shepherd seeks sheep sheep
shepherd seek master master seeks
therefore sheep
proteus sheep fodder follow shepherd shepherd
food follows sheep thou wages followest thy master
thy master wages follows thee therefore thou art
sheep
speed another proof make cry baa
proteus dost thou hear gav st thou letter julia
speed ay sir lost mutton gave letter lac
mutton lac mutton gave lost mutton nothing
labour
proteus small pasture store muttons
speed ground overcharg best stick
proteus nay astray twere best pound
speed nay sir less pound shall serve carrying
letter
proteus mistake mean pound pinfold
speed pound pin fold
threefold little carrying letter lover
proteus said
speed nodding ay
proteus nod ay noddy
speed mistook sir say nod ask
nod say ay
proteus set together noddy
speed taken pains set together take
pains
proteus shall bearing letter
speed well perceive must fain bear
proteus sir bear
speed marry sir letter orderly nothing
word noddy pains
proteus beshrew quick wit
speed yet overtake slow purse
proteus come come open matter brief said
speed open purse money matter may
delivered
proteus well sir pains said
speed truly sir think hardly win
proteus couldst thou perceive much
speed sir could perceive nothing
much ducat delivering letter hard
brought mind fear prove hard
telling mind give token stones
hard steel
proteus said nothing
speed much take thy pains testify
bounty thank testern requital
whereof henceforth carry letters sir
commend master
proteus go go gone save ship wreck
perish thee aboard
destin drier death shore exit speed
must go send better messenger
fear julia would deign lines
receiving worthless post exit

scene ii verona garden julia house

enter julia lucetta

julia say lucetta alone
wouldst thou counsel fall love
lucetta ay madam stumble unheedfully
julia fair resort gentlemen
every day parle encounter
thy opinion worthiest love
lucetta please repeat names show mind
according shallow simple skill
julia think st thou fair sir eglamour
lucetta knight well spoken neat fine
never mine
julia think st thou rich mercatio
lucetta well wealth
julia think st thou gentle proteus
lucetta lord lord see folly reigns us
julia means passion name
lucetta pardon dear madam passing shame
unworthy body
censure thus lovely gentlemen
julia proteus rest
lucetta thus many good think best
julia reason
lucetta woman reason
think think
julia wouldst thou cast love
lucetta ay thought love cast away
julia rest hath never mov

new playes maydenheads neare kin
much follow much mony g yn
stand sound well good play
whose modest sceanes blush marriage day

yet still modestie still retaines

make cry ground fan
witles chaffe wrighter
blastes bayes fam workes makes lighter
robin hood feare bring
say truth endlesse thing
ambitious aspire
weake almost breathlesse swim
deepe water hold
helping hands shall take
something doe save us shall heare
sceanes though art may yet appeare
worth two houres travell bones sweet sleepe
content play doe keepe
little dull time us perceave
losses fall thicke must needs leave florish

cosen arcite
thebs noble country
friends kindreds never
must behold comforts never see
hardy youthes strive games honour
hung painted favours ladies
like tall ships saile start among st em
eastwind leave en behinde us
like lazy clowdes whilst palamon arcite
even wagging wanton leg
stript peoples praises garlands
ere time wish em never
shall two exercise like twyns honour
armes againe feele fyry horses
like proud seas us good swords
better red eyd god war nev r wore
ravishd sides like age must run rust
decke temples gods hate us
hands shall never draw em like lightning
blast whole armies

arcite
palamon
hopes prisoners us
graces youthes must wither
like timely spring age must finde us
heaviest palamon unmarried
sweete embraces loving wife
loden kisses armd thousand cupids
shall never claspe neckes issue know us
figures selves shall ev r see
glad age like young eagles teach em
boldly gaze bright armes say
remember fathers conquer
faire eyd maides shall weepe banishments
songs curse ever blinded fortune
till shee shame see wrong done
youth nature world
shall know nothing one another
heare nothing clocke tels woes
vine shall grow shall never see
sommer shall come delights
dead cold winter must inhabite still

palamon
tis true arcite theban houndes
shooke aged forrest ecchoes
must halloa shake
pointed iavelyns whilst angry swine
flyes like parthian quiver rages
strucke well steeld darts valiant uses
foode nourishment noble mindes
us two shall perish shall die
curse honour lastly
children greife ignorance

arcite
yet cosen
even bottom miseries
fortune inflict upon us
see two comforts rysing two meere blessings
gods please hold brave patience
enjoying greefes together
whilst palamon let perish
thinke prison

men hate much

endles mine one another

new birthes love father friends acquaintance

never know perish

hence would seaver us

faire cosens company exeunt arcite keeper

palamon

even please life sent
may shall marry goodly
like enough duke hath taken notice
blood body falsehood
friend treacherous
get wife noble faire
let honest men ne love againe
would see faire one blessed garden
fruite flowers blessed still blossom
bright eies shine ye would
fortune life hereafter
yon little tree yon blooming apricocke
would spread fling wanton armes
window would bring fruite
fit gods feed youth pleasure
still tasted doubled
heavenly would make
neere gods nature feare

enter keeper

sure would love keeper
wher arcite

keeper

obtained liberty never
vpon oth life must set foote
vpon kingdome

palamon
hees blessed man
shall see thebs againe call armes
bold yong men bids em charge
fall like fire arcite shall fortune
dare make himselfe worthy lover
yet feild strike battle
lose cold coward
bravely may beare himselfe win
noble arcite thousand waies
liberty would doe things
vertuous greatnes lady
blushing virgine take manhood
seeke ravish

scene country near athens

enter arcite

arcite
banishd kingdome tis benefit
mercy must thanke em banishd
free enjoying face die
oh twas studdied punishment death

old wicked sins
could never plucke upon palamon
thou ha st start thou shalt stay see
bright eyes breake morning gainst thy window
let life thee thou shalt feede

nature nev r exceeded nev r shall
good gods happines palamon

gentle faire

pushes wenches driven

scene prison

enter iaylors daughter alone

daughter
let dukes divells rore
liberty venturd
brought little wood
mile hence sent cedar
higher rest spreads like plane
fast brooke shall keepe close
till provide fyles foode yet
yron bracelets love
stout hearted child thou art father
durst better indur cold yron done
love beyond love beyond reason
wit safetie made know
care desperate law
finde condemne wenches
honest harted maides sing dirge
tell memory death noble
dying almost martyr way takes
purpose way sure
unmanly leave
doe maides easily
trust men againe yet thank
done much kist
thinkes well scarcely
could perswade become freeman
made scruples wrong
father yet hope
considers love mine
take root within let doe
use kindly
use shall ile proclaime
face man ile presently
provide necessaries packe cloathes
patch ground ile venture
hee like shadow
ile ever dwell within houre whoobub
ore prison
kissing man looke farewell father
get many prisoners daughters
shortly may keepe selfe

act iii

scene forest near athens

cornets sundry places noise hallowing people
maying

enter arcite alone

arcite
duke lost hypolita tooke
severall land solemne right
owe bloomd may athenians pay
th heart ceremony queene emilia
fresher may sweeter
hir gold buttons bowes
th enamelld knackes th meade garden yea
challenge bancke nymph
makes streame seeme flowers thou iewell
th wood th world hast likewise blest place
thy sole presence thy rumination
poore man might eftsoones come betweene
chop cold thought thrice blessed chance
drop mistris expectation
giltlesse n tell lady fortune
next emely soveraigne far
may prowd takes strong note
hath made neere beuteous morne
prim st yeare presents
brace horses two steeds might well
paire kings backt field
crownes titles tride alas alas
poore cosen palamon poore prisoner thou
little dream st upon fortune
thou thinkst thy selfe happier thing
neare emilia thou deem st thebs
therein wretched although free
thou knew st mistris breathd
ear language livde eye coz
passion would enclose thee

enter palamon bush shackles bends fist
arcite

palamon
traytor kinesman
thou shouldst perceive passion signes
prisonment hand
owner sword othes one
iustice love would make thee
confest traytor thou perfidious
ever gently lookd voydest honour
eu r bore gentle token falsest cosen
ever blood made kin call st thou hir thine
ile prove shackles hands
void appointment thou ly st art
theefe love chaffy lord
worth name villaine sword
house clogges away

arcite
deere cosin palamon

palamon
cosoner arcite give language
thou hast shewd feate

arcite
finding
circuit breast grosse stuffe
forme like blazon holds
gentlenesse answer tis passion
thus mistakes enemy
kind honor honestie
cherish depend ev r
skip faire coz
ile maintaine proceedings pray pleas
shew generous termes griefes since
question equall professes
cleare owne way minde sword
true gentleman

palamon
thou durst arcite

arcite
coz coz beene well advertis
much dare ave seene use sword
th advice feare sure another
would heare doubted silence
breake though th sanctuary

palamon
sir
seene move place well
might justifie manhood calld
good knight bold whole weeke faire
day rayne valiant temper
men loose encline trecherie
fight like coupelld beares would fly
tyde

arcite
kinsman might well
speake act glasse
eare disdaines

palamon
come
quit cold gyves give sword
though rustie charity
one meale lend come
good sword thy hand doe say
emily thine forgive
trespasse thou hast done yea life
thou carry brave soules shades
dyde manly seeke
newes earth shall get none
thou art brave noble

arcite
content
againe betake hawthorne house
counsaile night
wholesome viands impediments
file shall garments
perfumes kill smell th prison
shall stretch selfe say arcite
plight shall choyce
sword armour

palamon
oh heavens dares
noble beare guilty busines none
onely arcite therefore none arcite
kinde bold

arcite
sweete palamon

palamon
doe embrace offer
offer doo onely sir person
without hipocrisy may wish winde hornes cornets
swords edge ont

arcite
heare hornes
enter musite least match
crost er met give hand farewell
ile bring every needfull thing pray
take comfort strong

palamon
pray hold promise
doe deede bent brow certaine
love rough powre
oile language ayre
could word give cuffe stomach
reconcild reason

arcite
plainely spoken
yet pardon hard language spur winde hornes
horse chide content anger
one face harke sir call
scatterd banket must guesse
office

palamon
sir attendance
please heaven know office
vnjustly atcheev

arcite
good title
perswaded question sicke
bleeding must cur suitour
sword bequeath plea
talke

palamon
one word
going gaze upon mistris
note mine

arcite
nay

palamon
nay pray
talke feeding breed strength
going looke upon sun
strengthens lookes
vantage ore enjoy till
may enforce remedy farewell exeunt

scene another part forest

enter iaylors daughter alone

daughter
mistooke brake meant gone
fancy tis welnigh morning
matter would perpetuall night
darkenes lord th world harke tis woolfe
hath greife slaine feare one thing
care nothing palamon
wreake wolves would jaw
file hallowd
hallow whoop
answeard call wolfe
doe service heard
strange howles live long night may
made prey weapons
run iengling gives
might call fell things listen
sence know man unarmd
smell resistance ile set downe
torne peeces howld many together
fed much
bold ring bell stand
char gone lye
father hang escape
selfe beg prizd life much
deny act would
try death dussons mop
food tooke none two daies
sipt water closd mine eyes
save lids scowrd brine alas
dissolue life let sence unsettle
least drowne stab hang selfe
state nature faile together
since thy best props warpt way
best way next way grave
errant step beside torment loe
moone cryckets chirpe schreichowle
calls dawne offices done
save faile point
end exit

scene another part forest

enter iaylors daughter

daughter
cold stars
little stars looke like aglets
sun seene folly palamon
alas hees heaven
yonder sea ther ship tumbles
ther rocke lies watching water
beates upon
ther leak sprung sound one cry
spoon winde l loose els
vp course two take boyes
good night good night ar gone hungry
would could finde fine frog would tell
newes parts th world would make
carecke cockle shell sayle
east north east king pigmes
tels fortunes rarely father
twenty one trust trice
morrow morning ile say never word

sing

ile cut greene coat foote knee ile clip
yellow lockes inch mine eie hey nonny nonny nonny
buy white cut forth ride ile goe seeke throw
world wide hey nonny nonny nonny

pricke like nightingale
put breast shall sleepe like top else
exit

scene another part forest

enter schoole master countrymen bavian wenches
taborer

schoolmaster
fy fy tediosity disensanity among ye
rudiments bin labourd long ye milkd unto ye figure
even plumbroth marrow understanding laid upon ye
still cry wherfore course freeze
capacities ye jane iudgements saide thus let
let let man understand mee proh deum medius
fidius ye dunces stand duke comes
close thicket duke appeares meete
unto utter learned things many figures heares nods
hums cries rare goe forward length fling
cap marke meleager bore
break comly like true lovers cast selves
body decently sweetly figure trace turne boyes

sweetly doe master gerrold

countreyman

countreyman

schoolmaster

theseus
cold beginning

schoolmaster
favour country pastime made
collected
ruder tongues distinguish villager
say veritie fable
merry rout else rable
company figure choris
fore thy dignitie dance morris
rectifier
title pedagogus let fall
birch upon breeches small ones
humble ferula tall ones
doe present machine frame
daintie duke whose doughtie dismall fame
dis dedalus post pillar
blowne abroad helpe thy poore well willer
thy twinckling eyes looke right straight
vpon mighty morr mickle waight
comes glewd together
makes morris cause came hether
body sport small study
first appeare though rude raw muddy
speake thy noble grace tenner
whose great feete offer penner
next lord may lady bright
chambermaid servingman night
seeke silent hanging mine host
fat spowse welcomes cost
gauled traveller beckning
informes tapster inflame reckning
beast eating clowne next foole
bavian long tayle eke long toole
cum multis alijs make dance
say shall presently advance

theseus
meanes deere domine

perithous
produce

schoolmaster

musicke dance knocke schoole

enter dance

ladies beene merry
pleasd yee derry

duke pleasd thee
done good boyes doe
give us tree twaine
maypole againe

wee l make thee laugh rout

never heard better

thy dogs swift strong
